programme.title: Apocalipse: A Guerra dos Mundos S1 E1
programme.desc: Deixando a Segunda Guerra Mundial para trás, as nações aliadas celebram vitória enquanto voltam à paz mundial. No entanto, nos bastidores do pós-guerra, um confronto mais sério está prestes a surgir: a Guerra Fria.

programme.title: Apocalipse: A Guerra dos Mundos S1 E2
programme.desc: 1947. Temendo que uma Europa fragilizada possa ceder ao Comunismo, a América lança o Plano Marshall, um apoio à reconstrução para as nações europeias. Os franceses também precisam de ajuda na Indochina, onde Ho Chi Minh, escondido na selva, vê o seu exército e poder crescer

programme.title: Apocalipse: A Guerra dos Mundos S1 E3
programme.desc: Setembro de 1950. Na Coreia, o conflito arrasta-se. Após uma aterragem bem sucedida em Incheon, o General MacArthur e as suas tropas saem mais uma vez derrotadas perto do rio Yalu, onde enfrentam um novo inimigo: a China. Truman pondera a bomba atómica? Na Indochina, os franceses estão a ser derrotados.

programme.title: Apocalipse: A Guerra dos Mundos S1 E4
programme.desc: Março de 1953. Estaline está morto. Depois de muitas e longas horas de agonia na sua propriedade, o "Pai dos Povos" é agora nada mais do que um corpo embalsamado. Os seus potenciais sucessores rapidamente chegam para prestar a sua homenagem. Na Berlim de leste, uma onda de esperança envolve os trabalhadores alemães que estão contra o partido. Será esta esperança aniquilada pelos tanques soviéticos? Na Ásia, os conflitos graves estão a chegar ao fim. Depois das tréguas de Panmunjom, os EUA abandonam a Coreia sem glória. As poucas tropas que permanecem no local aguardam, impacientes, uma visita de Marilyn Monroe. Entretanto, na Indochina, outro exército prepara um acontecimento muito menos emocionante. Os franceses esperam parar os Vietminh em Dien Bien Phu, uma aldeia rodeada de montanhas a quase 300 quilómetros de Hanoi. Contudo, os generais franceses mal suspeitavam que nesse preciso momento, o General Giap dos Vietminh e os seus conselheiros chineses estavam a engendrar um plano de batalha baseado numa armadilha: deixar as forças francesas instalar-se no vale Dien Bien Phu, rodeá-las e destruí-las. O exército francês rapidamente deixa o país, gravemente ferido e humilhado. Ho Chi Minh sai apenas parcialmente vitorioso. Durante as negociações em Genebra, os seus camaradas chineses e soviéticos não correspondem às expectativas, por receio de fazer escalar o conflito. Ho Chi Minh fica com o Vietname do norte, mas o sul continua nas mãos do ocidente. O que irá Ho Chi Minh fazer?

programme.title: Apocalipse: A Guerra dos Mundos S1 E5
programme.desc: 24 de fevereiro de 1956. Durante o 20º congresso do Partido Comunista Soviético, Khrushchev deixa toda a gente de boca aberta ao denunciar os crimes de Estaline. Sem negar a ideologia, o novo líder da URSS procura distanciar-se do seu antecessor e abrir-se ao mundo. O "Senhor K" está cheio de surpresas. Com que então bebe Pepsi com Nixon e insiste em passar um dia na Disneyland quando visita a América? Porém, por detrás desta máscara, o "carrasco da Ucrânia" não será brando. Em 1956, não hesitou em esmagar a revolta em Budapeste com um banho de sangue. Agora, prepara-se para uma coexistência com o recentemente eleito Presidente Kennedy que viria a ser tudo menos pacífica. O Muro de Berlim, a crise dos mísseis de Cuba, para não falar na assistência que presta a Ho Chi Minh na sua preparação para a reunificação. A Guerra do Vietname está prestes a começar. Kennedy tenta retaliar e envia conselheiros militares para treinar o exército do sul do Vietname. E, em Berlim, no dia 26 de junho de 1963, faz o seu famoso discurso carregado de esperança perante uma multidão emocionada: "Ich bin ein Berliner!".

programme.title: Apocalipse: A Guerra dos Mundos S1 E6
programme.desc: 22 de novembro de 1963. O mundo inteiro está em choque. O Presidente Kennedy acabou de ser assassinado durante uma viagem a Dallas. Até Khrushchev parece tocado pelas notícias trágicas. Numa coincidência surpreendente, Diem, o presidente sul-vietnamita, havia sido assassinado vinte dias antes, num golpe organizado pelos seus generais. Os protagonistas mudam, mas a guerra do Vietname arrasta-se. O novo presidente dos EUA, Johnson, afunda ainda mais o seu país no caos da guerra. Quase três milhões de jovens conheceram o Inferno: a selva, o calor insuportável e os Viet Cong, com os seus túneis e armadilhas. Pela primeira vez, a televisão desempenha um papel especial na guerra. Em 1968, os americanos descobrem o fiasco a acontecer no Vietname através de imagens da desastrosa ofensiva Tet transmitidas na TV. Massacres, abuso e tortura de soldados americanos e a derrota óbvia do seu exército. Em breve, os EUA não terão alternativa a não ser retirar as tropas. Será esta uma vitória do mundo comunista? Contudo, a URSS está na bancarrota. Enfraquecida pelas diversas campanhas pelo mundo, a União Soviética perde no Afeganistão. Em breve, as repúblicas "satélite" reclamam os seus direitos. Cada uma delas derruba o governo imposto por Moscovo. Em 1989, cai o Muro de Berlim, seguindo-se a explosão do império soviético. A bandeira vermelha com estrela dourada desce das torres do Kremlin. É o final da Guerra Fria. A guerra entre dois mundos chegou ao fim.

programme.title: Apocalipse: Hitler Invade o Este S1 E1
programme.desc: Junho de 1941: Hitler invade a URSS, com a intenção de conquistar o "Espaço Vital", com o qual sonha para o Reich, e conquistar o maior país do mundo.

programme.title: Apocalipse: Hitler Invade o Este S1 E2
programme.desc: Outubro de 1941: numa altura em que Hitler acredita que o seu triunfo está iminente, os seus homens e tanques congelam no local. Entretanto, o exército vermelho consolida as suas posições.

programme.title: Segundos Fatais S4 E1
programme.desc: Assista à desconstrução dos trágicos eventos, e as falhas de segurança, que levaram aos piores ataques de sempre em solo Americano desde Pearl Harbor.

programme.title: Segundos Fatais S4 E2
programme.desc: Numa tranquila manhã de Domingo, a 7 de Dezembro de 1941, a frota Americana que se encontrava no Havai foi atacada pelo exército Japonês, revelando a destruição dessa mesma frota o quão inesperado e mal preparados estavam.

programme.title: Segundos Fatais S4 E3
programme.desc: Analisamos as circunstâncias misteriosas que envolvem um trágico acidente no Alpes italianos em 1998 que fez com que 19 turistas e o operador de um teleférico caíssem de 300 pés de altura, perdendo a vida.

programme.title: Supercarros S1 E1
programme.desc: Neste episódio de Supercar Megabuild, Afzal Kahn e o seu departamento de pesquisa e desenvolvimento aceitam o desafio de transformar um Aston Martin Vantage V8 num supercarregado carro de corrida inspirado em GT. Ralph e Ranen, os cérebros de engenharia por detrás do projecto embarcam numa missão para tornar este supercarro elegante num veículo de competição agressivo e super rápido e que será legal para os clientes do Sr. Kahn. Se acertarem na receita, o Sr. Kahn acredita que este protótipo poderá ser o começo de algo grande.

programme.title: Supercarros S1 E3
programme.desc: Neste episódio de "Supercarros", os Engenheiros Ralph Hosier e Ranen Rudra deparam-se com uma tarefa aparentemente impossível: Converter um elegante Rolls Royce Silver Shadow de 1979 numa máquina artilhada para "drift". Esta será uma tarefa tremendamente complicada para estes experientes engenheiros, uma vez que nunca trabalharam num carro de "drift", e muito menos com este intuito numa marca prestigiada como a Rolls Royce. Para melhor compreenderem e se inspiraram nesta arte, irão até ao berço do "drifting" - Japão.

programme.title: Supercarros S1 E2
programme.desc: O guru da indústria automóvel e designer Afzal Kahn tem uma ideia de um protótipo baseado num veículo muito familiar para ele - o Range Rover Evoque. Ele planeia transformar o crossover urbano no derradeiro todo-o-terreno, um veículo inspirado no Rally Paris-Dakar. É uma viagem que fará os engenheiros especialistas testar o veículo num dos ambientes mais extremos imagináveis, fabricar e instalar um kit de suspensão único para o afastar ainda mais do chão, instalar luzes poderosas no tejadilho e colocá-lo num programa agressivo e inspirado no Dakar. Apenas se o protótipo de revelar capaz de ser um todo-o-terreno nas dunas do Sahara é que o Sr. Kahn poderá decidir se o poderá oferecer aos seus clientes aventureiros.

programme.title: Alasca: Os Primeiros Habitantes S1 E7
programme.desc: Os povos indígenas do Alasca enfrentam novos desafios à medida que os recursos do ártico dos quais dependeram durante séculos começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Alasca: Os Primeiros Habitantes S1 E8
programme.desc: Durante os dias e estações mais difíceis, os nativos do Alasca confiam nas tradições seculares. Daniel e Chris Apassingok enfrentam o gelo instável do mar de Bering, na esperança de conseguir encontrar uma morsa para alimentar o povo de Gambell.

programme.title: Alasca: A Nova Geração S3 E1
programme.desc: Apesar das temperaturas baixíssimas, os habitantes do Alasca têm de explorar novos territórios de todas as formas possíveis para sobreviver mais um dia.

programme.title: O Incrível Dr. Pol S11 E18
programme.desc: A Feira do Condado de Isabella está de volta e o Dr. Pol regressa também às funções de veterinário não-oficial da feira. Os SVP estão ocupados a tratar dores de barriga, picadas de abelha e crias.

programme.title: O Incrível Dr. Pol S11 E19
programme.desc: De emas instáveis a bezerros e potros, o Dr. Pol e os seus veterinários não param um segundo. Cachorrinhos, cabritos e muito amor é coisa que não falta por lá!

programme.title: O Incrível Dr. Pol S11 E20
programme.desc: Os veterinários fazem a sua magia em rostos a pingar, beagles bebés, feridas abertas e ossos partidos. Uma consulta de rotina a um cachorrinho traz uma surpresa para a Dra. Nicole.

programme.title: O Incrível Dr. Pol S11 E21
programme.desc: Há cachorrinhos por todo o lado à espera de consultas de rotina. A Dra. Brenda luta para tratar uma rena e o Dr. Pol tenta salvar um cão que comeu algo perigoso.

programme.title: O Incrível Dr. Pol S11 E22
programme.desc: O Dr. Pol trata uma porca que está demasiado doente para cuidar das suas 15 crias, de um pastor alemão que chocou contra um carrinho de golfe, de um potro com tremores e de muitos cachorrinhos.

programme.title: O Incrível Dr. Pol S1 E1
programme.desc: Neste episódio de estreia, conhecemos Dr. Jan Pol, que, juntamente com a sua esposa Diane, gere uma clínica veterinária no meio da zona rural do Michigan. Tão trabalhador como excêntrico, o Dr. Pol não é menos do que uma lenda local dentro da comunidade graças à sua abordagem da velha guarda e directa ao cuidado animal. Com a ajuda da sua colega Drª. Brenda, o Dr. Pol mantém um ritmo agitado enquanto cuida de animais de estimação e trata um grande leque de gado das quintas que o rodeiam. À medida que o 30º aniversário da clínica se aproxima, os Pols planeiam um churrasco de porco à moda antiga para os seus empregados, clientes de longa data e antigos colegas. No meio dos convidados especiais encontramos o seu filho Charles, que vive em Los Angeles e decide prolongar a sua estadia para ajudar o seu pai com esta carga formidável de trabalho.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: Sobreviver à Amazónia S1 E2
programme.desc: Na segunda parte do seu desafio na Amazónia, Hazen junta-se aos cowboys Wapishana num percurso com o gado antes de enfrentar uma anaconda gigante, cascavéis venenosas e uma travessia de rio perigosa para evitar as cheias.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: Sobreviver à Amazónia S1 E3
programme.desc: Na terceira parte do seu desafio, Hazen enfrenta a floresta da montanha Kanuku Mountain usando as competências de sobrevivência dos habitantes locais antes de prender enguias elétricas e invadir uma floresta de bambu impenetrável.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: Sobreviver à Amazónia S1 E4
programme.desc: Na quarta parte do seu desafio, Hazen usa as competências do povo Arekuna para enfrentar cascatas, aranhas que esguicham fezes e a cobra mais perigosa do mundo.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: Sobreviver à Amazónia S1 E5
programme.desc: Agora na última parte do seu desafio, Hazen atravessa quilómetros de pântano cheio de cobras para chegar ao Oceano Atlântico. Com a ajuda do povo Warau, Hazen aprende como viver da água e a enfrentar abelhas assassinas.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E1
programme.desc: Do ponto mais elevado da Bacia Mekong, Hazen Audel desce pela floresta nebulosa em busca do povo Hmong, que caça com recurso a venenos antigos e ferramentas artesanais provenientes do que restou da Guerra do Vietname.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E2
programme.desc: Hazen Audel mergulha num mundo de tesouros naturais, em busca de cogumelos preciosos que crescem nas nas florestas antigas de Laos após meses de monções.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E3
programme.desc: O sobrevivencialista Hazen Audel enfrenta montanhas calcárias vertiginosas e cavernas escuras e repletas de água na sua busca por uma aldeia escondida nas selvas da Baía de Mekong.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E4
programme.desc: Hazen Audel enfrenta um grande desafio de sobrevivência, procurando caçadores de mosquete tradicionais no planalto de Bolaven na Baía de Mekong.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E5
programme.desc: Hazen Audel vai em busca da píton-reticulada gigante nos pântanos do Beung Kiat Ngong, uma dos grandes habitats de vida selvagem da região de Mekong.

programme.title: História: As Partes Giras S1 E8
programme.desc: O mundo moderno que temos hoje ao nosso dispor não apareceu de repente. Pelo contrário, é o resultado de sucessivas invenções motivadas pela inspiração, pela perseverança e, por vezes, por pura sorte. Ao rever os maiores inventores da História, descobrimos que muitos deles formaram as suas ideias sobre outras que as antecederam. Ou que, em alguns casos, as roubaram.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru e Brasil S6 E1
programme.desc: Os agentes de segurança do Aeroporto Internacional Jorge Chavez, em Lima, no Peru, trabalham sem parar para descobrir traficantes. Um homem esconde cocaína na estrutura da sua mala de viagem. Ele acaba por quebrar ao contar que a mãe foi presa. Um passageiro com destino a Espanha transporta droga em embalagens de comida não identificadas. Um casal quer viajar com destino ao México com um animal de estimação pouco comum. Uma mulher com destino ao México teme estar a transportar contrabando disfarçado como um presente. E ainda, azeitonas contaminadas com cocaína.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru e Brasil S6 E2
programme.desc: Em Lima, no Aeroporto Internacional Jorge Chavez, Peru, a polícia anti-narcóticos trabalha arduamente para impedir que saia droga do país. Os agentes correm contra o tempo para localizar um suspeito, que acaba por ser descoberto numa localização improvável. Um traficante arrogante com uma mala contaminada tem o dobro da carga esperada. Um jovem ingeriu e colou drogas ao corpo. Um caso de dependência, mas, desta vez, de café. Cocaína escondida debaixo de um casaco de inverno. Peças mecânicas ocultam cocaína.

programme.title: A História de Deus com Morgan Freeman S1 E4
programme.desc: Nesta série, Morgan Freeman tenta perceber e aprofundar de que forma a fé pode moldar as nossas vidas, qualquer que seja a religião que professamos ou aquilo em que acreditamos.

programme.title: A História de Deus com Morgan Freeman S2 E2
programme.desc: Morgan procura várias figuras líderes religiosas para perguntar: "Porque são eles os escolhidos? E que papel desempenham na sua fé?" A viagem leva-o à volta do mundo para conhecer um rapaz de 9 anos no Minnesota que é a reencarnação de um lama Tibetano até à Tailândia para testemunhar sofrimentos extraordinários de alguns que estão dispostos a sacrificar-se pelos pecados de outros. Descobriremos que o seu objectivo é obter um vislumbre da visão de Deus do mundo para que possam ensinar-nos o que isso significa.

programme.title: A História de Deus com Morgan Freeman S2 E1
programme.desc: Morgan explora a maneira como as pessoas incorporam o Céu e o Inferno nas suas vidas. Desde testemunhar exorcismos na Etiópia à descoberta do sacrifício humano entre os antigos Maias até conhecer uma mulher que experienciou o seu próprio Céu após uma experiência de quase morte, este episódio descobre que o Céu e o Inferno não são apenas ideias mas parte de todos nós, uma parte de que desejamos escapar e outra que desejamos alcançar.

programme.title: A História de Deus com Morgan Freeman S2 E3
programme.desc: Será que Deus foi retirado das nossas vidas modernas? Ou será que há momentos em que a sua presença de faz notar? Morgan parte numa demanda para encontrar essas pessoas que acreditam ter provas de Deus. Morgan encontra-se com um sobrevivente do 11 de Setembro, que encontrou Deus entre os escombros das Torres Gémeas e praticantes de Ifa que usam a sagrada arte da divinação. A viagem para encontrar o divino leva-nos ao deserto da Namíbia para testemunhar um ritual de cura de San e para a convergência da natureza e da ciência para descobrir que a existência de Deus está algo entre o conhecimento e a dúvida.

programme.title: Segundos Fatais S4 E4
programme.desc: Os sobreviventes recontam os acontecimentos do dia 5 de outubro de 1999 quando um comboio expresso com destino a Londres colidiu com um comboio suburbano em hora de ponta, originando uma enorme bola de fogo e matando 32 pessoas.

programme.title: Segundos Fatais S4 E5
programme.desc: Quando dois aviões colidiram sobre a Alemanha, em 2002, 71 pessoas perderam a vida, incluindo grupos de alunos que se dirigiam para a visita de estudo de uma vida. Vitaly Kaloyev, que perdeu a família no acidente, assassinou o controlador de tráfego aéreo.

programme.title: Segundos Fatais S4 E6
programme.desc: Em 1984, uma cidade indiana tornou-se no palco de um dos maiores desastres de sempre provocados pelo Homem quando, em poucas horas, 3000 pessoas sufocaram até à morte devido à inalação de gases tóxicos.

programme.title: Supercarros S1 E6
programme.desc: Neste episódio de Supercarros, Afzal Kahn e o seu departamento de desenvolvimento são confrontados com um desafio duro, proposto por um cliente misterioso. Terão de modificar um Mercedes G-Wagen, ao adicionar as derradeiras capacidades de segurança. O trabalho levá-lo-á ao México e à capital mundial dos raptos enquanto descobrem o como e o porquê dos principais sistemas de seguranças disponíveis para o seu veículo. Também aprenderão como instalar a mais recente tecnologia à prova de bala no Mercedes, apetrechar um sistema de injecção de nitrogénio para garantir uma fuga rápida e os aspectos da segurança serão integrados num pack elaborado por Kahn.

programme.title: Supercarros S1 E7
programme.desc: Numa tentativa de expandir o seu império de projectos de carro, Afzal Kahn dá um projecto à equipa de engenharia que poderá revelar-se no projecto mais difícil até à data - criar um Jeep inspirado em Kahn que será maior e melhor que algum que já tivesse visto antes. E se isso não bastar, terão de o tornar num sucesso numa terra onde a Jeep é tida em elevada estima - os Estados Unidos da América. É um grande trabalho que Kahn quer ver feito num curto período de tempo porque tem uma mostra automóvel agendada para o lançamento do novo Jeep em Hollywood. Os rapazes planeiam usar os seus contactos a sul da fronteira para apressar o trabalho no México, um plano que não é aprovado por Kahn. Será que Ranen e Ranen conseguirão levar a sua avante ou será que o sonho americano se tornará num pesadelo?

programme.title: Supercarros S1 E9
programme.desc: Neste episódio de Supercarros, os engenheiros Ranen e Ranen são encarregues de realizar o sonho do seu chefe, Afzal Kahn, de produzir um dos carros mais rápidos do mundo. Kahn desafia-os a criar um carro que consiga ganhar ao seu Bugatti Veyron numa corrida de 400 metros. E, como se isso não fosse difícil o suficiente, dá-lhes apenas três semanas para o fazer. Em busca da máquina doadora perfeita, Ranen e Ralph deslocam-se até ao Japão e ao mundo do tuning automóvel. Para frustração de Kahn, os rapazes regressam com um Nissan GTR e um hack japonês especialista ECU. Mas apenas isto não bastará para rivalizar com a velocidade e poder necessárias para vencer o Bugatti Veyron. Assim, o carro é levado para a oficina onde Ranen e Ranen modificam todo o motor. O futuro do projecto é colocado em causa quando o GTR dos rapazes perde contra um Audi R8, até Ranen e Ranen o voltarem a colocar na pista com uma mistura explosiva de combustível à base de etanol. Mas será que o trabalho deles será inútil quando levarem o GTR até à Santa Pod Raceway para uma exibição de supercarros ou será que conseguirão o sonho de construir um dos carros mais rápidos do mundo?

programme.title: Alasca: A Nova Geração S3 E2
programme.desc: Quando as temperaturas atingem níveis baixos recorde, os habitantes do Alasca têm de enfrentar as condições atmosféricas adversas para assegurar as necessidades básicas de sobrevivência no Ártico.

programme.title: Alasca: A Nova Geração S3 E3
programme.desc: Quando as temperaturas atingem níveis baixos recorde, os habitantes do Alasca têm de tomar medidas para assegurar a sua sobrevivência contra as condições atmosféricas adversas do Ártico.

programme.title: Alasca: A Nova Geração S3 E4
programme.desc: O jogo da Mãe Natureza não é para fracos ou pouco preparados e a próxima geração de habitantes do Alasca tem de estar à altura da ocasião. Os Rowland investigam vestígios animais suspeitos que ameaçam a segurança da família. Em Deadman Lake, Alex Javor tem de se adaptar para sobreviver às condições atmosféricas adversas enquanto Chris Morse parte sozinho para melhorar a sua vida no Cosna, deixando Jessi por sua conta.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru S3 E7
programme.desc: As equipas de segurança no maior aeroporto do Peru trabalham 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana, para parar a actividade ilegal. O seu maior problema: tráfico de cocaína. A polícia apressa-se para lidar com um incidente raro num voo doméstico: algo suspeito numa mala de um cidadão sérvio. Os agentes encontram cocaína líquida disfarçada em garrafas numa mala de outro homem. Um passageiro sem bagagem reaparece a carregar uma mala e os agentes apressam-se para investigar. Dinheiro falso é descoberto no edifício do correio.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru S3 E8
programme.desc: As equipas de segurança no maior aeroporto do Peru trabalham 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana, para parar a actividade ilegal. O seu maior problema: tráfico de cocaína. A polícia pára uma mulher a viajar com uma criança de cinco anos. Se ela é transportadora, os agentes têm de perceber o que fazer com a criança. Um cidadão mexicano é encontrado com uma grande quantidade de cerveja e bebidas ligeiras. Todos estes itens poderão conter cocaína. Os agentes descobrem uma nova e criativa maneira de esconder cocaína em embalagens de comida.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru S3 E9
programme.desc: As equipes de segurança do aeroporto de Lima, no Perú, trabalham 24 horas por dia para impedir atividades ilegais. A maior ameaça: contrabando de cocaína. As radiografias mostram formas incomuns nos sapatos de plataforma de uma mulher - e algo chocante dentro do seu corpo. Um suspeito diz que tem informações para derrubar organizações de tráfico de drogas. Um suspeito numa escala pode estar a transportar cocaína escondida em garrafas de bebida. Pílulas de energia destinadas à Inglaterra podem conter outra coisa: cocaína de alto teor de pureza.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru S3 E10
programme.desc: As equipas de segurança em Lima, no maior aeroporto do Peru trabalham 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana, para parar a atividade ilegal. A maior ameaça: tráfico de cocaína. Um casal é apanhado a transportar cocaína em bebidas engarrafadas. E a rapariga pode desconhecer todo o esquema. A cocaína descoberta estava disfarçada em embalagens de comida. E este pode não ser o primeiro trabalho do correio de droga. A polícia descobre cocaína cosida num casaco isotérmico e isto pode ser apenas o início.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru S3 E11
programme.desc: As equipas de segurança em Lima, no maior aeroporto do Peru trabalham 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana, para parar a atividade ilegal. A maior ameaça: tráfico de cocaína. Dois passageiros ucranianos são apanhados com cocaína. E um pode ter enganado o outro. A polícia vai precisar de um intérprete para descobrir. Um casal que celebra o seu aniversário pode estar a levar para casa mais do que apenas memórias. A alfândega encontra mais de 130.000 euros escondidos na bagagem de mão de um passageiro que deu entrada e inicia a investigação.

programme.title: Segurança Aeroportuária: Peru S3 E12
programme.desc: As equipas de segurança em Lima, no maior aeroporto do Peru trabalham 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana, para parar a atividade ilegal. A maior ameaça: tráfico de cocaína. Alguns tapetes feitos à mão incluem artesanato adicional: Centenas de sacos de cocaína. Um estudante de férias transporta mais do que apenas lembranças: um compartimento escondido contém cocaína. Um correio letão quer cooperar. A cocaína está escondida dentro de uma estátua de Jesus Cristo em madeira. A polícia faz uma escuta enquanto o correio recebe uma chamada do seu contacto.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E1
programme.desc: Do ponto mais elevado da Bacia Mekong, Hazen Audel desce pela floresta nebulosa em busca do povo Hmong, que caça com recurso a venenos antigos e ferramentas artesanais provenientes do que restou da Guerra do Vietname.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E2
programme.desc: Hazen Audel mergulha num mundo de tesouros naturais, em busca de cogumelos preciosos que crescem nas nas florestas antigas de Laos após meses de monções.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E3
programme.desc: O sobrevivencialista Hazen Audel enfrenta montanhas calcárias vertiginosas e cavernas escuras e repletas de água na sua busca por uma aldeia escondida nas selvas da Baía de Mekong.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: O Poderoso Rio Mekong S1 E4
programme.desc: Hazen Audel enfrenta um grande desafio de sobrevivência, procurando caçadores de mosquete tradicionais no planalto de Bolaven na Baía de Mekong.

programme.title: Presos no Estrangeiro S15 E10
programme.desc: Andrea, uma bailarina de cabaret, recusa-se a aceitar os estereótipos de género e desafia o patriarcado do negócio internacional de droga ao importar grandes quantidades de cocaína para a Austrália, nos anos 90. Quando finalmente é apanhada pela polícia, a sua entrada numa prisão australiana extremamente rígida força-a a enfrentar os demónios que a colocaram no caminho do crime.

programme.title: Como Apanhar um Traficante S4 E2
programme.desc: O HSI Miami apanha um carregamento de peixe repleto de cocaína, o Serviço de Alfândega e Proteção de Fronteiras combate o tráfico humano na fronteira e os especialistas em tentativas de localização procuram passageiros.

programme.title: Como Apanhar um Traficante S4 E4
programme.desc: O HSI de Denver embarca numa missão para desmantelar uma rede de tráfico de MDMA na dark web, avaliada em 8 milhões de dólares. No Arizona, o Serviço de Alfândega e Proteção de Fronteiras descobre um indivíduo que costuma atravessar a fronteira, desta vez com $43,500 de fentanil escondido no carro.

programme.title: Pesca no Limite: A Hora da Verdade nos Outer Banks S1 E11
programme.desc: Os barcos do sul têm dominado a competição durante toda a temporada, mas agora é a vez de os capitães do norte brilharem. Contudo, quando um dos campeões do norte, o Capitão Dave Carraro, tem um problema hidráulico no barco, o FV-Tuna.com fica encalhado no mar.

programme.title: Dutch Caribbean Coastguards S6 E1
programme.desc: The Coastguards perform a routine drug check on a party boat meanwhile a difficult interception with a drug boat challenges the crew of HNLMS Holland.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt S8 E8
programme.desc: Archaeologists investigate how the mighty river Nile transformed ancient Egypt into one of the greatest civilisations of the ancient world.

programme.title: Primal Survivor: Over the Andes S6 E1
programme.desc: On the 1st leg of his epic journey across S. America, Hazen Audel battles snake-filled swamps and a deadly descent to join a hunt and harvest feast.

programme.title: Rise Again: Tulsa and the Red Summer
programme.desc: Washington Post reporter DeNeen Brown chronicles the discovery of a mass grave in Tulsa Oklahoma and investigates the reign of racial terror America.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted Showdown S3 E1
programme.desc: Gordon leaps off cliffs for seaweed, milks a buffalo, and kayaks for lobsters in the choppy seas along England's Jurassic Coast.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted Showdown S3 E3

programme.desc: Archaeologists and treasure hunters battle it out over half a billion dollars worth of gold and silver. Who will win the Battle for the Black Swan?

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class S8 E3
programme.desc: Parents arrested for carrying cocaine. A woman has fake documents for her kids. A couple conceal cocaine. A mother carries cocaine in food packages.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation S10 E8
programme.desc: On its final approach to Zurich, Alitalia Flight 404 plows into a forested hillside killing everyone on board.

programme.title: Colossal Machines S6 E2
programme.desc: How do you move an aircraft carrier? How does an oil rig withstand hurricane winds? When the Ohio class submarine reaches the bottom of the ocean, how does it stay intact and silent? Discover the engineering secrets of massive machines that help us explore our oceans.

programme.title: Seconds From Disaster S10 E1
programme.desc: Deconstructing the tragic events and security lapses that led to the worst attacks on American soil since Pearl Harbor.

programme.title: Hitler's Last Stand S6 E6
programme.desc: After a nighttime crossing of the Savio River, a platoon of Canadian tank hunters fights off Nazi Panther tanks with only the weapons they can carry.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad: Crime & Punishment S10 E10
programme.desc: Latin pop star Jimmy Bauer smuggles heroin from the Dominican Republic. Canadian rising hockey star Ryan Phillips smuggles marijuana into the US.

programme.title: Hard Time S12 E1
programme.desc: 'What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas.' But pushing the legal limits of a good time can land you in the tightly controlled world of jail.

programme.title: Bloody Tales of Europe S6 E5
programme.desc: Dr Suzannah and Joe Crowley combine their skills to unlock the secrets and offer new insights into some of European history's bloodiest events.

programme.title: Pumas At The End of The World: Birth S1 E1
programme.desc: Cazadora, the only survivor of Solitaria's four cubs, has a lot to learn and she must do it on her own.

programme.title: Ultimate Enemies (Revealed) S0 E1
programme.desc: National Geographic filmmakers, Dereck and Beverly Joubert, explore how some animals are thrust together by the forces of nature-sometimes through a millennium of evolution or even last year's drought. In the aftermath of strange elephant deaths, they piece together a visually stunning story that confirms their theory that lions were hunting elephants. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Magic Of Disney's Animal Kingdom 2 S2 E9
programme.desc: Lily the Masai giraffe needs an X-ray to determine if she's broken her toe, but she's reluctant to be anesthetized. The park's tight-knit pack of painted dog brothers must be separated to get their annual health check. And at the Tree of Life, the lesser flamingo flock gets a visit from the stork with a very cute addition for Disney's Animal Kingdom!

programme.title: Pumas At The End of The World: Birth S1 E1
programme.desc: This story of Solitaria, a puma mother with four cubs, set in Torres del Paine.

programme.title: Pumas At The End of The World: Birth S1 E1
programme.desc: Cazadora, the only survivor of Solitaria's four cubs, has a lot to learn and she must do it on her own.

programme.title: Wild Scene Investigation 1 S1 E7
programme.desc: Domestic cats are going missing in Vermont, and the locals are all pointing the finger of blame at one wild animal, but with little to support their accusations, who or what is really the culprit?

programme.title: Yukon Vet 7 S7 E3
programme.desc: With winter quickly approaching, Dr. Oakley is busy working to prepare the animals of Alaska and the Yukon for the cold. Dental damage is no trouble for an old horse with a history of being a survivor. Another horse's mysterious nosebleed needs a deeper look.

programme.title: Yukon Vet 7 S7 E4
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck as Dr. Oakley castrates a once wild stallion. Then, everyone holds their breath to see if the newly gelded horse succeeded in getting three mares pregnant before winter. What is thought to be a benign cyst on Curly the dog may be more serious than her owner thought.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Side S1 E1
programme.desc: All life is shaped by one powerful driving force: the need to breed. Every animal on the African plains is a player in the mating game.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Side S1 E2
programme.desc: There is no tougher place to bring up baby than in the wilds of Botswana. Every parent will do what they can to give their young a fighting chance.

programme.desc: Lily the Masai giraffe needs an X-ray to determine if she's broken her toe, but she's reluctant to be anesthetized. The park's tight-knit pack of painted dog brothers must be separated to get their annual health check. And at the Tree of Life, the lesser flamingo flock gets a visit from the stork with a very cute addition for Disney's Animal Kingdom!

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders: Season 1 S1 E2
programme.desc: Ethiopia is a wilderness of extremes - from lush lakes to towering peaks - where life has had to adapt in order to survive. This ancient land has cradled life since the dawn of time, and beyond the scorched deserts lie fortified mountains that conceal natural treasure troves of wildlife found nowhere else on Earth.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics S0 E1
programme.desc: From tree-climbing leopards, skull-crushing jaguars to quick-digging sand cats, watch the killer strategies that make wild cats possibly the deadliest family on Earth.

programme.title: Swamp Lions S0 E1
programme.desc: The Swamp Pride is on its knees. Its mighty male was killed by poachers, leaving three mothers and their cubs defenseless in one of the toughest landscapes for a lion in Africa. Busanga Swamp is a quagmire, even in the dry season.

programme.title: Clash of Tigers S0 E1
programme.desc: Krishna, a 6 year old tigress gave birth to her second litter of four healthy cubs. A tiger mother is secretive and protective of her cubs as she is their sole caretaker.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol 21 S21 E1
programme.desc: The vets respond to multiple emergencies; a horse seriously traumatized in an accident to a sweet little dog left with a very bad injury to its eye after a fight. Dr. Pol treats a racehorse with a career-threatening hoof injury, while Drs. Nicole and Brenda bring the clinic on the road. A feisty bull reindeer has a badly lacerated antler and there's even a guinea fowl needing Dr. Pol's help.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol 21 S21 E2
programme.desc: The docs of PVS are on the case! With an unruly cow, a colt's double hernia, and a wrinkly puppy's first visit on the books, it's a busy week ahead. While Animal Control shadows Dr. Pol around town, Dr. Nicole treats a German Shepherd that's so sick she can barely walk, and Dr. Lisa stitches up a cat's creepy leg wound.

programme.title: World's Deadliest (2019) S3 E3
programme.desc: From Polar bears in Alaska, to Leopard seals in Antarctica, many predators specialise in hunting in frozen conditions.

programme.title: Pop Goes the Vet with Dr. Joya 1 S1 E8
programme.desc: The team gets some Mojo when an adorable mini Shih Tzu mix visits the clinic, Natty the French Bulldog channels a hairless sphynx and hopes that Dr. Joya can help recover her spunk, plus there are triple the dog pops when Maggie Mae the tiny Chihuahua, Poncho the English Staffordshire Terrier, and Cocoa the Great Pyrenees Lab mix come in with mysterious lumps and bumps that must be removed!

programme.title: Pop Goes the Vet with Dr. Joya 1 S1 E7
programme.desc: Sake the Australian Shepherd channels her inner chicken and grows a wattle, Maxwell the Havanese has mysterious pus pockets along his back, Atticus the Pit Bull's eardrums have gone missing, Bailey the Great Dane has creepy crawly skin, Dr. Joya's little lion cub has Lhasa love for a Donut, Kaylee the Shih Tzu is a tumor factory, plus Bella the Golden Retriever has a one-pound pop!

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders: Season 1 S1 E2
programme.desc: Ethiopia is a wilderness of extremes - from lush lakes to towering peaks - where life has had to adapt in order to survive. This ancient land has cradled life since the dawn of time, and beyond the scorched deserts lie fortified mountains that conceal natural treasure troves of wildlife found nowhere else on Earth.

programme.title: Snakes In The City 3 S3 E5
programme.desc: Snake catchers Simon and Siouxsie destroy a kitchen for a harmless house snake, but find an 8-foot black mamba instead. Africa's largest cobra is loose in a shopping mall and a mechanic finds a deadly snake in his toolbox.

programme.title: Snakes In The City 2 S2 E2
programme.desc: In this episode, Simon and Sousxie travel from one side of the city to the other responding to the cries for help as snakes wonder into the wrong places. From multi millionaires to low income rural areas, the snakes are everywhere. Simon and Siouxsie take risks everyday as they come face to face with some of the world's most dangerous snakes.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol 6 S6 E15
programme.desc: After a long winter these antsy animals are ready for warm weather and spring brings all new troubles to the Pol clinic. Reggie the pit-bull is in for a nasty gash while Roxy and Lily, a pair of curious pups, are dealing with their own problems after provoking a prickly porcupine. Then add one feisty mini-horse, an unlucky pet pig, and a breeched calving, and Dr. Pol's plate is maxing out. Meanwhile, Charles may have bitten off more than he can chew when he decides to enter a pancake-eating contest at the annual Shepherd's Maple Syrup Festival.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Side S1 E2

programme.title: Yukon Vet 7 S7 E5
programme.desc: A young reindeer with many ailments needs Dr. Oakley's help to get back into fighting shape and an elderly porcupine poses a pokey problem.

programme.title: Yukon Vet 7 S7 E7
programme.desc: While Dr. Oakley awaits a litter of puppies, she hits the road to treat a stubborn bison, and a moose with a respiratory issue. In the clinic, she checks a Great Dane's swollen leg.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Side: Dynasties S99 E1
programme.desc: Botswana is home to exotic and diverse creatures, but all share one single purpose: keep the bloodline alive. From finding a mate, to raising the next generation, Africa's most beloved animals fight for survival every day.

programme.title: Killer Animal Tactics S0 E1
programme.desc: From top predators to clever creatures, these killers are some of the most armed and dangerous animals in the world. In order to survive, they use some of the scariest strategies and lethal weapons like ambush, camouflage, claws and paws, venom, pack hunting and more to take down prey. The name of the game is kill or be killed!

programme.title: The Alps: High Life S1 E1
programme.desc: Here, in the western foothills of the Alps in Italy and France, the Mediterranean flora and fauna meets the animals and plants of the alpine environment. When lizards in the low-lying olive groves begin seeking out mates in spring, the marmots are still hibernating in their burrows in the snow-covered higher elevations.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders: Season 1 S1 E3
programme.desc: The Sahara, the largest desert in the world: an extreme environment covering a vast swathe of northern Africa. With hardly any water or food available, on the surface, it appears to be a desolate empty land. But hidden beyond the parched exterior, specialist species have adapted to this harsh landscape.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Side: Dynasties S99 E1
programme.desc: Botswana is home to exotic and diverse creatures, but all share one single purpose: keep the bloodline alive. From finding a mate, to raising the next generation, Africa's most beloved animals fight for survival every day.

programme.title: Killer Animal Tactics S0 E1
programme.desc: From top predators to clever creatures, these killers are some of the most armed and dangerous animals in the world. In order to survive, they use some of the scariest strategies and lethal weapons like ambush, camouflage, claws and paws, venom, pack hunting and more to take down prey. The name of the game is kill or be killed!

programme.title: The Living Edens (2014) 1 S1 E6
programme.desc: Travel with Nat Geo WILD to Madagascar, a place that is home to creatures found nowhere else on Earth. From curious chameleons to loud lemurs, get a rare look at this amazing world of diverse and unique life. Watch as the odd-looking aye-aye finds food using a strange adaptation and the fierce fossa stalks an evasive meal. See life transform when the dry season comes to an end and barren, brown forests become lush, green canopies. The beginning of mating season keeps the creatures of Madagascar occupied, as finding a mate proves to be no easy task. The marsh of Lac Alaotra creates its own collection of unique creatures like the adorable bandro. But this vast marsh and the lives of those that inhabit it become threatened by human interference.

programme.title: The Alps: High Life S1 E1
programme.desc: Here, in the western foothills of the Alps in Italy and France, the Mediterranean flora and fauna meets the animals and plants of the alpine environment. When lizards in the low-lying olive groves begin seeking out mates in spring, the marmots are still hibernating in their burrows in the snow-covered higher elevations.

programme.title: Storm Cats S0 E1
programme.desc: In a landscape where rain is rare, violent and short-lived, Africa's big cats lead a predictable life, masters of the dry terrain to which they are adapted. But then, for eight intense weeks, violent storms transform their world, shattering their routine. While the risk of death is as high as ever, so too is opportunity for those that seize it. Storm Cats is an intimate portrayal of leopards, lions and cheetahs pushed to the edge by nature's raw power. Only those that can adapt will survive.

programme.title: Leopard Kingdom S0 E1
programme.desc: Karula, the Queen of Djuma, reigned over South Africas Sabi Sand for over a decade. But now, the queen is gone. Her offspring now hope to claim the land that was once hers.

programme.title: Lion Dynasty S0 E1
programme.desc: Our unique story spans a decade and follows one of Tanzania's most powerful lion prides as they overcome mounting obstacles by relying on strong family bonds. With seven lionesses in their prime, 13 cubs between them, and two part-time magnificent males, the Bushbuck pride is large and in charge -- and determined to make sure that their legacy lives on.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol Season 15 S15 E2
programme.desc: This week, on The Incredible Dr. Pol, 'tis the season for mysterious cases, wild chases, and a little Christmas magic. Doc is still recovering from ankle surgery and rolls into his first case on his scooter only to find two chickens suffering from bare bums! Then, Dr. Emily and Dr. Nicole team up for a farm call to see a cow with a retained placenta - or so they think!

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol 7 S7 E1
programme.desc: Summer is in full swing in central Michigan and Pol Vet Services has revved up to meet the growing needs of their clients - from farm calls to clinic emergencies, Dr. Pol and crew are full speed ahead. But animals are not the only ones in need of Dr. Pol's attention, as he and Charles embark on a mission to fix up his vintage DMC DeLorean for the local car show. The car will have to wait though, as the Pol duo have the pedal to the metal en route to a serious emergency - Bow Tie, a beloved family cow has suffered an enormous prolapse after giving birth. The longer the uterus is out the more it swells, so time is of the essence if they are to save Bow Tie in this emergency farm call. While Dr. Pol and Charles have their hands full, Dr. Brenda is headed to Caryl Dairy where the situation is grim for a cow struggling to give birth. With zero progress made since Dr. Brenda's arrival, the focus shifts from delivering the calf to saving the mother. Dr. Brenda resorts to a last ditch effort - a bovine cesarean section - in order to save the mother. As it sits, the DeLorean sounds more like a wheezing goat than a purring kitten - it needs some TLC from Doc and Charles. After discovering electrical issues in the car, it's a race to the finish getting it ready to show at the Mount Pleasant car show. Where's the flux capacitor when you need it?!

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Lions E1
programme.desc: A fierce carnivore that is designed to kill - so what happens when the deadliest go head to head against it? Lions take on hyenas, crocodiles, hippos, the cape buffalo, and even each other, all across their pride lands as they battle each other to survive Nature's eternal war.

programme.title: Born in Africa: Season 1 S1 E1
programme.desc: All newborns must immediately assimilate two fundamental notions: recognizing their mother as individuals of their own species, and learn to master the body they are discovering.

programme.title: Born in Africa: Season 1 S1 E2
programme.desc: Each species follows a different rhythm of growth, and this applies to the learning process. As the days go by, we will witness each of our characters' progress and missteps.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders: Season 1 S1 E3
programme.desc: The Sahara, the largest desert in the world: an extreme environment covering a vast swathe of northern Africa. With hardly any water or food available, on the surface, it appears to be a desolate empty land. But hidden beyond the parched exterior, specialist species have adapted to this harsh landscape.

programme.title: Snakes In The City 3 S3 E1
programme.desc: In this episode of Snake City, Simon and Siouxsie receive a terrified call after a large Black Mamba is spotted inside a potting shed. On arrival they are escorted into a dark room, filled with clay pots and paints. Hidden behind a large heavy cupboard is Africa's most feared snake - the Black Mamba. Simon and Siouxsie are at a severe disadvantage - they can't see the snake but the snake can see them! Simon and Siouxsie put their life on the line every day in their obsession to save snakes. It's a risk they are prepared to take.

programme.title: Snakes In The City 2 S2 E5
programme.desc: In this episode, the calls are coming in thick and fast. A giant lizard enters a garden and gets into a fight with a dog. By the time Simon and Siouxise get there, the battle is lost for this monitor lizard, and it has suffered severe injuries. Simon and Siouxsie are in the business of saving the lives of animals, no exceptions.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol 6 S6 E16
programme.desc: Popeye the rabbit comes to Pol Clinic with overgrown teeth and leaves with a couple of dates! Popeye's owner, Jodi, is raising money for her therapeutic riding organization, Hopewell Ranch. With a little charm, she gets Dr. Pol to agree to auction off dinner with him and Diane as one of their prizes at their annual fundraiser. With Charles auctioning off a date as well, the stage is set for a friendly competition to see who can get the highest bidder. Dr. Pol doesn't have time to fret though; he has his hands full with Mary, a pup who swallowed a dangerous amount of nicotine, and Blondie, a goat with a mysterious disease that could infect her entire herd. Anyone bidding for this vet's time is going to have to wait in line.

programme.title: Storm Cats S0 E1

programme.title: BURNING HEARTS E3
programme.desc: Constancia réussit à sortir de prison grâce à Beto qui veut la séduire. Giovanni assiste à l'accident de Camila, mais Bruna insiste pour qu'il la laisse seule afin que la police ne l'accuse pas de tentative d'assassinat.

programme.title: JOIA RARA E100
programme.desc: David est satisfait d'Aurora pour ce qui est arrivé à Lola. Ernest décide de demander pardon à Perola. Cavalcante trouve les preuves laissées par Benito et obtient un mandat d'arrêt contre Manfred.

programme.title: VIVER A VIDA E28
programme.desc: Susana tente de séduire Jorge. Elle l'invite donc à un diner. Malgré son état d'ivresse, Jorge raconte à Susana qu'il est très amoureux de Luciana.

programme.title: Paixão E19
programme.desc: Miguel et Helena cherchent un prénom pour leur futur enfant. Cependant, Helena va consulter un médecin pour avorter. Maria Paula finit par avouer à Miguel que son père biologique est João.

programme.title: BURNING HEARTS E2
programme.desc: Constancia s'incruste à l'anniversaire de Fedora et gâche la fête. La soirée dégénère, les deux filles en viennent aux mains et Fedora finit la tête la première dans son méga gâteau tout bleu. Désespérée et humiliée, elle erre dans les rues et veut se jet

programme.title: JOIA RARA E99
programme.desc: Mundo ne supporte plus les attaques d'Estenio à l'encontre de Iolanda. Benito appelle Ernest et demande de l'argent en échange des preuves qu'il a contre lui.

programme.title: VIVER A VIDA E27
programme.desc: Elana reçoit les fleurs de la part de Marco et en est très heureuse. Luciana peut maintenant bouger ses bras et sentir la sensibilité de ses jambes. Après un test, Dora réalise qu'elle est enceinte.

programme.desc: Susana tente de séduire Jorge. Elle l'invite donc à un diner. Malgré son état d'ivresse, Jorge raconte à Susana qu'il est très amoureux de Luciana.

programme.title: Paixão E20
programme.desc: Helena annonce la perte du bébé à Miguel, en lui cachant évidement qu'il s'agit d'un IVG et elle lui demande avec insistance de l'épouser.

programme.title: BURNING HEARTS E3
programme.desc: Constancia réussit à sortir de prison grâce à Beto qui veut la séduire. Giovanni assiste à l'accident de Camila, mais Bruna insiste pour qu'il la laisse seule afin que la police ne l'accuse pas de tentative d'assassinat.

programme.title: JOIA RARA E100
programme.desc: David est satisfait d'Aurora pour ce qui est arrivé à Lola. Ernest décide de demander pardon à Perola. Cavalcante trouve les preuves laissées par Benito et obtient un mandat d'arrêt contre Manfred.

programme.title: VIVER A VIDA E29
programme.desc: Moretti informe Marco et Teresa que la lésion dont souffre Luciana est incurable. Teresa se porte mal et Marco la conduit chez elle. Le souhait d'Ingrid est que Jorge et Luciana ne se marient pas.

programme.title: Paixão E21
programme.desc: Après les résultats du test ADN, Louisa et Miguel se fixent un rendez-vous pour parler d'un accord extra-judiciaire concernant Catarina. Zé demande à Helena d'empêcher Miguel d'aller à ce rendez-vous.

programme.title: BURNING HEARTS E4
programme.desc: Camila sort du coma, mais elle ne sait plus qui elle est. Léonardo sort le grand jeu et Fédora est conquise. Il lui fait croire qu'il doit se marier avec une cousine, à moins qu'il épouse une autre femme riche, il la demande en mariage.

programme.title: JOIA RARA E101
programme.desc: Manfred prend Zefinha en otage. Ernest poursuit Manfred dans une course de voitures. Perola parvient à communiquer avec Ernest dans le monde des esprits et lui demande de revenir.

programme.title: A Flying Jatt

programme.title: Players
programme.desc: Two thieves, a magician, a computer hacker, a wannabe actor and a explosives expert plan a robbery to fulfill the dream of Victor Braganza. Will they be successful or will destiny have something different for them?

programme.title: The Face Of Truth
programme.desc: Two inseparable friends in college do well in their studies, complete college and get married. Four years later, Prasad Saxena, another former collegian meets with a pregnant Mridula and informs her that Swati has committed suicide.

programme.title: Rising Star
programme.desc: A city guy goes to rural Rajasthan to look for his uncle.

programme.title: Run Johnny
programme.desc: Forced to kill a woman, Johnny is granted the opportunity to live two lives, one in which he kills her and the other where he attempts to save her.

programme.title: When We Met
programme.desc: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

programme.title: Thank You
programme.desc: Three wives engage the services of a private investigator after they suspect their respective husbands of infidelity.

programme.title: This Love
programme.desc: The film begins with the birth of Karishma and Karan on the same day in the same hospital. 23 years later, unknown of their family backgrounds, they meet each other one summer at Krakow University Poland and fall in love.

programme.title: This Love
programme.desc: The film begins with the birth of Karishma and Karan on the same day in the same hospital. 23 years later, unknown of their family backgrounds, they meet each other one summer at Krakow University Poland and fall in love.

programme.title: Shady Business Again
programme.desc: Babu Rao, Raju and Shyam, are living happily after having risen from rags to riches. Still, money brings the joy of riches and with it the greed to make more money - and so, with a don as an unknowing investor, Raju initiates a new game.

programme.title: Run Johnny
programme.desc: Forced to kill a woman, Johnny is granted the opportunity to live two lives, one in which he kills her and the other where he attempts to save her.

programme.title: When We Met

programme.title: Poison
programme.desc: Police Inspector Sonia Mehra is married to her subordinate Siddharth, and both are employed by the Goa Police Force. They share a fairly harmonious relationship. Then one day, a woman named Anna Verghese goes missing and is believed dead.

programme.title: Relationship Of Heart
programme.desc: A millionaire unintentionally kills the husband of the woman he loves . After she is diagnosed with amnesia due to the tragedy, he feels guilty and wonders if he should confess.Cast: Aishwarya Rai, Arjun Rampal, Director: Naresh Malhotra 2003

programme.title: Blindfolded Robbery
programme.desc: Vijay lives a wealthy lifestyle and has been working with a bank for the last 30 years. one day he get fired. Angered he decides to get his vengeance by robbing the bank as no one knows the internal security as well as he does.

programme.title: Lost Moon
programme.desc: The film begins in 1954 and ends in 1965. The film is based on the film industry of the 50s. It is the story of two talented people. Albeit the slow pace of the movie, its interspersed with references to the cunning ways of celebrities.

programme.title: Highlights S1 E1
programme.desc: Highlights

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S7 E5
programme.desc: The character-driven cartoon chronicles the nautical and often nonsensical adventures of SpongeBob, an incurably optimistic and earnest sea sponge, and his underwater friends. Dwelling a few fathoms beneath the tropical isle of Bikini Atoll in the sub-surface city of Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob lives in a two-story pineapple. Instead of taking the logical approach to everyday challenges, SpongeBob approaches life in a wayward and unconventional way. Whether searching for the ultimate spatula to perfect his burger flipping technique at the Krusty Krab or just hanging out with his best friend Patrick (an amiable starfish), SpongeBob's good intentions and overzealous approach to life usually create chaos in his underwater world.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z S1 E248
programme.desc: Dragon Ball Z continues the adventures of Goku, who, along with his companions, defend the Earth against villains ranging from aliens (Frieza), androids (Cell) and other creatures (Majin Buu). While the original Dragon Ball anime followed Goku from childhood to early adulthood, Dragon Ball Z is a continuation of his adult life, but at the same time parallels the life of his son, Gohan, as well as the development of his rival Vegeta.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S7 E7
programme.desc: The character-driven cartoon chronicles the nautical and often nonsensical adventures of SpongeBob, an incurably optimistic and earnest sea sponge, and his underwater friends. Dwelling a few fathoms beneath the tropical isle of Bikini Atoll in the sub-surface city of Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob lives in a two-story pineapple. Instead of taking the logical approach to everyday challenges, SpongeBob approaches life in a wayward and unconventional way. Whether searching for the ultimate spatula to perfect his burger flipping technique at the Krusty Krab or just hanging out with his best friend Patrick (an amiable starfish), SpongeBob's good intentions and overzealous approach to life usually create chaos in his underwater world.

programme.title: LoliRock S1 E50
programme.desc: LoliRock follows the journey of young Iris, a spirited teenage girl with a beautiful voice and an unending desire to help others. When Iris joins the girl group LoliRock, her life is changed forever, as a new world of music, mysteries and magical powers is revealed. These three new friends are now bound together by their destinies as magical princesses and a fight against injustice. Marathon Media (creators of Totally Spies!) have once again created a cast of characters that are aspirational and serves as role models to a generation of children for whom justice has become a central value. With experienced, world renowned talent, and proven producers, LoliRock is sure to connect with every girl's magical inner self.

programme.title: Balala the Fairies Ocean Magic S1 E1
programme.desc: As human beings, Haixin and Xia fan got their dream magic energy by chance. With the consent of magic fairy Xiya, they became little magic fairy and guarded the human world and magic ocean together with Xiya

programme.title: Kungfu Masters of the Zodiac S1 E1
programme.desc: Nian Beast wreaks havoc on the earth. A little boy named Xiao Hai travels across the vast land, looking for twelve masters of Zodiac, learns peerless martial arts, improves his cultivation, and finally defeats Nian.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super S1 E99
programme.desc: Six months after the defeat of Majin Buu, The mighty Saiyan Son Goku continues his quest on becoming stronger.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super S1 E100
programme.desc: Six months after the defeat of Majin Buu, The mighty Saiyan Son Goku continues his quest on becoming stronger.

programme.title: Dino Rampage S1 E59
programme.desc: Dinosaurs have occupied most of the earth, and human living space is limited to underground. A synthetic person of dinosaur genes, while seeking his own destiny, discovered the truth buried in history. Embarked on a dangerous road to eliminate mutated dinosaurs and revive human civilization.

programme.title: Balala the Fairies Ocean Magic S1 E2
programme.desc: As human beings, Haixin and Xia fan got their dream magic energy by chance. With the consent of magic fairy Xiya, they became little magic fairy and guarded the human world and magic ocean together with Xiya

programme.title: Quanzhi Gaoshou S1 E1
programme.desc: Two years ago, Glory started out as just another MMORPG, but its real-world influence has grown as more countries begin to recognize esports as an official sport. Now, in China, arrangements are being made to hold the first professional league of Glory, culminating in the Glory Championship.Friends Ye Qiu and Su Muqiu both aspire to make a career out of esports. However, due to personal reasons, Ye Qiu has been hesitant until now to chase his dream.

programme.title: The White Snake S2 E1
programme.desc: In the late Tang Dynasty, Guoshi mobilized the masses to hunt snakes in large numbers. The white snake who went to assassinate the national division lost his memory. He was arrested and saved by a Xuan, a snake village youth. In order to help the girl find back her memory, the two embarked on a journey of adventure. In the process, their feelings grew rapidly, but the identity of the young snake demon gradually revealed. On the other hand, the inevitable war between the national teacher and the snake family was about to start, and their love was facing a huge test

While the original Dragon Ball anime followed Goku from childhood to early adulthood, Dragon Ball Z is a continuation of his adult life, but at the same time parallels the life of his son, Gohan, as well as the development of his rival Vegeta.

programme.title: Dino Rampage S1 E61
programme.desc: Dinosaurs have occupied most of the earth, and human living space is limited to underground. A synthetic person of dinosaur genes, while seeking his own destiny, discovered the truth buried in history. Embarked on a dangerous road to eliminate mutated dinosaurs and revive human civilization.

programme.title: Balala the Fairies Ocean Magic S1 E4
programme.desc: As human beings, Haixin and Xia fan got their dream magic energy by chance. With the consent of magic fairy Xiya, they became little magic fairy and guarded the human world and magic ocean together with Xiya

programme.title: Kungfu Masters of the Zodiac S1 E3
programme.desc: Nian Beast wreaks havoc on the earth. A little boy named Xiao Hai travels across the vast land, looking for twelve masters of Zodiac, learns peerless martial arts, improves his cultivation, and finally defeats Nian.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S6 E21
programme.desc: The character-driven cartoon chronicles the nautical and often nonsensical adventures of SpongeBob, an incurably optimistic and earnest sea sponge, and his underwater friends. Dwelling a few fathoms beneath the tropical isle of Bikini Atoll in the sub-surface city of Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob lives in a two-story pineapple. Instead of taking the logical approach to everyday challenges, SpongeBob approaches life in a wayward and unconventional way. Whether searching for the ultimate spatula to perfect his burger flipping technique at the Krusty Krab or just hanging out with his best friend Patrick (an amiable starfish), SpongeBob's good intentions and overzealous approach to life usually create chaos in his underwater world.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S6 E22

programme.title: Astro Boy S1 E16
programme.desc: Originally intended to be kept a secret, the Pinocchio-like character becomes a publicly renowned superhero -- complete with devices like laser-firing fingers, uncanny hearing, and jet-powered boots -- all eventually used to repulse an alien invasion of Earth.

programme.title: Highlights S1 E1
programme.desc: Highlights

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: A usurper builds a house of traps where his treasures are hidden and where many talents lose lives.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Heroes Two begins with the burning of the Shaolin Temple, and chronicles the efforts of Fang Shi-yu (Alexander Fu Sheng) and Hung Si-kuan (Chen Kuan Tai) as they combat the forces of oppression, fighting alongside the Chinese revolutionaries.

programme.title: Song of Phoenix E22
programme.desc: Qu Yuan was born into a noble family but his life is changed forever after he falls in love with a slave girl, Mo Chou. Together the two witness the conflict between the rich and poor, and the deeply depressed Qu Yuan realizes his country is racked with corruption and doomed to fall.

programme.title: Song of Phoenix E23
programme.desc: Qu Yuan was born into a noble family but his life is changed forever after he falls in love with a slave girl, Mo Chou. Together the two witness the conflict between the rich and poor, and the deeply depressed Qu Yuan realizes his country is racked with corruption and doomed to fall.

programme.title: Legend of Mount Shu E18
programme.desc: As the Guardian of the Fire-soul Sect, Yu Yingqi is destined to find and destroy the Red Soul Stone, which possesses an immense power enough to destroy his people and even the whole world. To find the Red Soul Stone, Yu Yingqi, and his sister Yu Yingnan set out on a journey to look for the five tokens which have the power to retrieve and counterbalance the Red Soul Stone. However, the journey is not an easy one. Will they be able to find the five tokens? And can they successfully destroy the Red Soul Stone?

programme.title: Legend of Mount Shu E20

programme.title: Ultimate Athletic Showdown E119
programme.desc: Ultimate Athletic Showdown is an extreme sports game available to people from all walks of life and of different ages and gender. Anyone can take part in it but they'll soon find out that those challenges are beyond imagination!

programme.title: Love and Destiny E48
programme.desc: After falling into sleep for thousands of years, the God of Warrior Jiu Chen was awakened by a Goddess named Ling Xi. Doubting Ling Xi's identity, Jiu Chen kept her as his maid. The two began to grow affections for each other after spending time together. Ling Xi was found to be born cursed with an ominous spirit, which may undo the spell of the Ghost Lord. This curse caused great difficulties to Jiu Chen and Ling Xi's relationship. With Jiu Chen's help, Ling Xi gained her new life as the Princess of Shanling Tribe. After all the hardships, when the two were about to harvest love, the Ghost Lord undid the spell and became free again. The world was plagued and people of all tribes suffered greatly. To ensure the peace of the world, Jiu Chen jumped into Fulingyuan to lock up all the demons.

programme.title: Chinese Paladin III E18
programme.desc: This is a prequel to Chinese Paladin and takes place 50 years earlier. Joey is a happy-go-lucky, mischievous, and with-a-hunger-for-money young man. He gets hold of a magical jade which forces him to meet Snow, a saucy young woman. They also meet Chasin who is a senior disciple of the Shu Sect. All three have to overcome numerous obstacles, which include confronting their pasts, along the way of an epic fantasy adventure.

programme.title: Twins Mission
programme.desc: An evil gang of twins hold up a train to steal a magical Tibetan artifact, the Heaven's Bead from 3 dalai lamas. This artifact has healing powers and is a highly desirable item. A battle ensues and the artifact is knocked from the hands of a parachuting villain into the bag of an unsuspecting passerby. The passerby, oblivious, gets into his van and heads to Hong Kong. This is where the other set of twins come in; they are aided by the twin Laus and Uncle Luck as they try to get the Heaven's Bead back.

programme.title: The Long Ballad E9
programme.desc: Li Changge is a daughter of Li Jiancheng, the Crown Prince of Tang and supposed heir to the throne. Her mother is A'jin, a tribal princess and the former lover of Li Changge's uncle, Li Shimin. After losing her family to court politics, Li Changge faked her death and hid her identity. She unexpectedly met a tribal prince named Ashile Sun, who was the adopted son of Illig Qaghan - the ruler of the steppes and rival of Tang. She found out about the ruler's schemes against Tang, and decided to take action. As a result, Ashile Sun became the Qaghan's enemy while helping Li Changge. Yet, they soon realized that there was another rival plotting against both the Tang and Qaghan.

programme.title: Guardians of the Ancient Oath E40
programme.desc: The Dayu Kingdom was founded by the Baili clan, and coexisted with the Lang people across the mountains, and the conquests continued. The emperor and the prince passed away one after another, and the emperor's youngest son Baili Haohe succeeded to the throne. At that time, Hao He was young, and his mother, He Shi, was in charge of the government. Although Baili Hongxuan and Baili Hongshuo, sons of the deceased prince, were loyal to the young emperor, Baili Hongxuan had repeatedly won military exploits to keep the people of Yuguo safe. But the queen mother was provoked by the traitorous officials, and she was still afraid of the two Baili brothers. Although the young emperor had a lot of trust in the two brothers and was willing to help them, he was also more than enough. The new leader of the Lang tribe, Ming Yefeng, discovers the true identity of Baili Hongyi, the daughter of the King of Pingyuan. At this time, the mysterious man discovered that there were disturbing signs in Yecheng, the imperial city of Yu Kingdom, so he secretly arranged it, hoping to gather strength to keep the people of the world safe.

programme.title: The Gods E61
programme.desc: Daji and Erlang Shen are close friends, they love each other since their childhood. Daji's whole life is changed by an accidental while she is possessed by a fox demon. With a beautiful face, she is chosen by the King Zhou of Shang and then married to him.

programme.title: Love Between Fairy and Devil E19
programme.desc: An immortal girl from the Po Xin tribe had her tribe vanquished by the Demon Lord, Dongfang Qingcang. She was reborn ten thousand years later as a lowly immortal of the Heavenly Tribe, Xiao Lanhua (Little Orchid). Lan Hua unknowingly revived Dongfang Qingcang, her mortal enemy, who was trapped in the Hao Tian Tower. In order to regain his freedom, Dongfang Qingcang wants to sacrifice Xiao Lanhua's immortal soul to unleash the curse placed on his body. In the process, the heartless demon falls or the gentle and adorable young fairy dies.

programme.title: One and Only E1
programme.desc: Zhou Sheng Chen was raised by his brother, the Emperor, until the age of thirteen, when he set out to defend the border and establish himself as a loyal and accomplished general. Cui Shi Yi, the well-read daughter of an esteemed family, has been betrothed to the Crown Prince since birth. However, political scheming and tragic events result in Cui Shi Yi falling mute, her former fiance becoming a child Emperor, and Zhou Sheng Chen returning to the capital amidst a cloud of political turmoil.

programme.title: Ashes of Love E47
programme.desc: The Flower Deity dies after giving birth to a daughter, Jin Mi. She saw a prophecy that her daughter will suffer a great love trial within the first thousand year of her life, thus before dying, she gave her a magical pill that prevents her from feeling and expressing romantic love.

programme.title: Ashes of Love E48
programme.desc: The Flower Deity dies after giving birth to a daughter, Jin Mi. She saw a prophecy that her daughter will suffer a great love trial within the first thousand year of her life, thus before dying, she gave her a magical pill that prevents her from feeling and expressing romantic love.

programme.title: Police Beauty & K9 E39
programme.desc: 10 beautiful young policewomen, who are experts in their respective fields, are given an unexpected task: to train police dogs. At first they think they're too good for the job and they're reluctant to do it. But after interacting, investigating and fighting crimes with their police dogs, they're awed by what police dogs can do.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: A man studies kung fu at the Shaolin Temple to fight back against the oppressive Manchu government.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: Two clans compete for dominance over the martial arts world in this classic of violent swordplay and political intrigue. A complex tale of deception and double crosses. Killer Clans leaves viewers guessing every step of the way. Masterful fight choreography from Yuen Cheung Yan (Yuen Clan member and brother of Yuen Woo Ping) and Tong Gaai fills the screen with bloody sword fighting and imaginative weaponry, delivering both great drama and fantastic martial arts.

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Eternal Wave is a Chinese film set during the anti-Japanese occupation era starring Aaron Kwok, Zhao Li Ying and Zhang Han. It follows the main protagonist Lin Xiang who is a spy working underground to reestablish what was destroyed during the Battle of Shanghai. He meets a simple yet patriotic young lady who becomes his partner as they infiltrate the enemy as a couple. Apart from that, they cross paths with Liang Dong, a man whose motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Flame's Daughter E1
programme.desc: Lie Ruge, a lively and passionate heiress of Liehuo Heights, travels to a famous brothel in the Capital to learn how to win a man's heart, since her first love, an arrogant man named Zhan Feng, broke up with her. But surprisingly, she meets the owner of the brothel, Yin Xue, who has entered a life of immortality just for a chance to meet her again, and has found himself cursed with an unrequited longing for love. As a sad and beautiful love story unfolds, the secrets of the martial arts world are gradually revealed.
