programme.title: LOVERS & SINNERS E13
programme.desc: Lovers and sinners' mirrors the life of Pastor Brume Braithwaite, a charismatic preacher and a symbol of perfection whose only cross is the sultry devious beauty he shares a roof with.

programme.title: IN YOUR ARMS
programme.desc: Peter refuses to give his wife what she wants most which is a divorce. The more he tries to stop her the more she is determined to leave him. Will he successfully convince her not to divorce.

programme.title: THE WRECKER
programme.desc: Growing increasingly desperate, a married woman asks her young associate to seduce her husband in order to frame him once and for all.

programme.title: Brothers E442
programme.desc: Ador is a model police officer dedicated to the ideals of service, honor and justice. He is respected by his community and well-loved by his family and peers. But Ador suddenly disappears in a police operation against human trafficking. His wife, young son and his grandmother are worried, but his superior tells them that he is seriously wounded and recovering in a safe house. A week after, Ador returns to his family and duty. Everyone around him feels that he behaves differently. There are events in the past he cannot remember and he does things he is not accustomed to do. Ador's loved ones try to understand that this is caused by trauma from the past encounter. But what they don't know is that Ador is already dead. And the person living with them is his long-lost twin brother, Cardo. Cardo is asked to take his brother's place to find out who is behind the human trafficking syndicate and weed out some police officers protecting it. While Cardo makes it his personal mission to avenge his brother's death, he has to deal with old wounds that separated him from Ador. He also finds himself slowly falling in love with his brother's wife and finding fulfillment in being a father to his brother's son. What awaits Cardo when he has to face the truth in the end?

programme.title: Irreplaceable E29
programme.desc: Emerging from a terrible event that changes the course of his life, Emman finds a stable job and lives a simple life in the province of Alcala with his father and brother. Blessings continue to come Emman's way when he reunites with his son, Robbie, for the child's birthday celebration and finally buries the hatchet with his ex-wife Celine. However, Celine's fiancé Anton cannot help but burn with jealousy despite her continued reassurance. As their reunion nears its end, things take a turn for the worse when an unidentified man takes Robbie captive in broad daylight. The story of Emman's and Celine's loss is every parent's nightmare. To lose one's child is devastating, and to lose them to an organ trafficking syndicate preying on defenseless and innocent children is an abomination. The couple, once estranged, come together to search for their son, and discover their love for one another is still there. In the process, they discover the betrayal of people they trust, and the evil permeating within their community.

programme.title: La Doña E158
programme.desc: Worlds collide and lives shatter when Altagracia, a powerful and elegant businesswoman, plots a twisted revenge while falling in love.

programme.title: Mea Culpa E11
programme.desc: After passing their Bar examinations, six friends get on board for a celebration out of town. One night of getting drunk and getting high leads to a road accident. With a bright future ahead of them, they decided to bury and forget the truth of that trivial night. But, their crime will be unearthed by a mother who will got to any lengths to find the child she loves.

programme.title: Mea Culpa E12
programme.desc: After passing their Bar examinations, six friends get on board for a celebration out of town. One night of getting drunk and getting high leads to a road accident. With a bright future ahead of them, they decided to bury and forget the truth of that trivial night. But, their crime will be unearthed by a mother who will got to any lengths to find the child she loves.

programme.title: A Soldier's Heart E7
programme.desc: The series primarily focuses on the soldiers of the 4th Infantry Division of the Philippine Army and their actions during combat. Through multiple perspectives, the story focuses on these soldiers, mainly: Alex Marasigan, an IT expert who quits his desk job and joins because just like his brother, he wants to serve the country, Abraham "Abe" Kamlun, a Tausug Muslim man, who, despite his family's opposition of the move, joins the Army nonetheless, and Michael Mendoza, a boy who joins the Army to provide for his family. The series also focuses on their Moro separatist adversaries, led by Saal Alhuraji, also known by his nom de guerre Abdul Waajid, who seeks to avenge his father who was killed by the military.

programme.title: I'll Never Say Goodbye E13
programme.desc: Amid a beautiful island in their youth, Waldo and Aryann were once deeply in love. But they are tor apart by tragedy, when Waldo goes to jail after accidentally killing Aryann's uncle who attempted to molest her. Aryann does everything she can to get Waldo out of prison and later finds herself being forced into prostitution. On her first night as an escort, she meets Tristan, a rich man who unexpectedly does not take advantage of her vulnerability. Nothing happens between them, but Tristan leaves Aryann a large sum of money, enough to hire a lawyer who helps free Waldo. Their happiness is short-lived, when the revenge-seeking brother of Aryann's uncle ends up shooting Waldo. With his body nowhere to be found, Aryann presumes Waldo is dead. It turns out that a nurse named Leila saved and treated Waldo until he recovered from his post-traumatic disorder. But by the time he returns to his hometown. Waldo learns Aryann has moved on and already started a new life in the city. Years pass, and as Waldo pursues his dream of becoming a marine engineer, a twist of fate reunites him with his former flame. His boss Tristan introduces him to his fiancee, who is none other than his one great love, Aryann, now a successful lawyer. When their paths collide, old wounds and feelings resurface as they try to resist one another. Waldo and Aryann's love story has been marred by time and circumstance, and worse, is now imperilled by Tristan and bitter rivals. Will their undying love survive the odds?

programme.desc: Worlds collide and lives shatter when Altagracia, a powerful and elegant businesswoman, plots a twisted revenge while falling in love.

programme.title: A Soldier's Heart E8
programme.desc: The series primarily focuses on the soldiers of the 4th Infantry Division of the Philippine Army and their actions during combat. Through multiple perspectives, the story focuses on these soldiers, mainly: Alex Marasigan, an IT expert who quits his desk job and joins because just like his brother, he wants to serve the country, Abraham "Abe" Kamlun, a Tausug Muslim man, who, despite his family's opposition of the move, joins the Army nonetheless, and Michael Mendoza, a boy who joins the Army to provide for his family. programme.title: I'll Never Say Goodbye E14
programme.desc: Amid a beautiful island in their youth, Waldo and Aryann were once deeply in love. But they are tor apart by tragedy, when Waldo goes to jail after accidentally killing Aryann's uncle who attempted to molest her. Aryann does everything she can to get Waldo out of prison and later finds herself being forced into prostitution. On her first night as an escort, she meets Tristan, a rich man who unexpectedly does not take advantage of her vulnerability. Nothing happens between them, but Tristan leaves Aryann a large sum of money, enough to hire a lawyer who helps free Waldo. Their happiness is short-lived, when the revenge-seeking brother of Aryann's uncle ends up shooting Waldo. With his body nowhere to be found, Aryann presumes Waldo is dead. It turns out that a nurse named Leila saved and treated Waldo until he recovered from his post-traumatic disorder. But by the time he returns to his hometown. Waldo learns Aryann has moved on and already started a new life in the city. Years pass, and as Waldo pursues his dream of becoming a marine engineer, a twist of fate reunites him with his former flame. His boss Tristan introduces him to his fiancee, who is none other than his one great love, Aryann, now a successful lawyer. When their paths collide, old wounds and feelings resurface as they try to resist one another. Waldo and Aryann's love story has been marred by time and circumstance, and worse, is now imperilled by Tristan and bitter rivals. Will their undying love survive the odds?

programme.title: Brothers E444
programme.desc: Ador is a model police officer dedicated to the ideals of service, honor and justice. He is respected by his community and well-loved by his family and peers. But Ador suddenly disappears in a police operation against human trafficking. His wife, young son and his grandmother are worried, but his superior tells them that he is seriously wounded and recovering in a safe house. A week after, Ador returns to his family and duty. Everyone around him feels that he behaves differently. There are events in the past he cannot remember and he does things he is not accustomed to do. And the person living with them is his long-lost twin brother, Cardo. Cardo is asked to take his brother's place to find out who is behind the human trafficking syndicate and weed out some police officers protecting it. While Cardo makes it his personal mission to avenge his brother's death, he has to deal with old wounds that separated him from Ador. He also finds himself slowly falling in love with his brother's wife and finding fulfillment in being a father to his brother's son. What awaits Cardo when he has to face the truth in the end?

programme.title: Irreplaceable E31
programme.desc: Emerging from a terrible event that changes the course of his life, Emman finds a stable job and lives a simple life in the province of Alcala with his father and brother. Blessings continue to come Emman's way when he reunites with his son, Robbie, for the child's birthday celebration and finally buries the hatchet with his ex-wife Celine. However, Celine's fiancé Anton cannot help but burn with jealousy despite her continued reassurance. As their reunion nears its end, things take a turn for the worse when an unidentified man takes Robbie captive in broad daylight. The story of Emman's and Celine's loss is every parent's nightmare. To lose one's child is devastating, and to lose them to an organ trafficking syndicate preying on defenseless and innocent children is an abomination. The couple, once estranged, come together to search for their son, and discover their love for one another is still there. In the process, they discover the betrayal of people they trust, and the evil permeating within their community.

programme.title: Viral Scandal E29
programme.desc: Kakay is an OFW who has been working abroad while her husband Dan works as a furniture maker. By working abroad, she hopes to provide a better future for her family. She thinks her sacrifices have been paying off now that her eldest Rica is on the verge of finishing her apprenticeship in an architectural firm and is about to take the board. Their real-life nightmare begins when Rica gets involved in a video that goes viral. As soon as Kakay learns about the scandal, she comes home to face the judgment and censure of the people around them. Aside from her family, she will also get support from her trusted friend and protector, Kyle, played by Joshua. How will Rica be able to prove her innocence in the said video? How will Kakay protect and defend her child from the accusations? What is the role of Troy Ramones', the mayor of Sidero, in the life of Rica and Kakay?

programme.title: Argentina, Land of Passion and Revenge E154
programme.desc: Torcuato and Bruno, two Spanish friends, flee from the Civil War to take refuge in Argentine territory. However, luck is not presented to them in the same way and they will soon succumb to mutual betrayals.

programme.title: The General's Daughter E57
programme.desc: 2nd LT Rhian Bonifacio is a Military Nurse for the AFP and is dedicated in saving lives. But she has a secret. She's a spy, trained by her very own father, Tiago, to exact revenge against his enemy, Marcial, a general of the army. She will be wedged between the two forces because of her love for her family. Believing that what she's doing is for the good of all, what will she do when she discovers that everything she's fighting for is a lie? That Tiago, the father she has known and loved all her life is the real enemy using her against her real father, Marcial?

programme.title: The General's Daughter E58
programme.desc: 2nd LT Rhian Bonifacio is a Military Nurse for the AFP and is dedicated in saving lives. But she has a secret. programme.title: Full Moon E27
programme.desc: Ferit Aslan is a very successful businessman, and is extremely organized. He wants the same manner of organization in both his private and professional life. Nazli who is studying gastronomy needs to find a job immediately as she is responsible for covering the expenses of the home she shares with her friend and sister. She is a stubborn and adamant personality, so she has a tough time keeping a job. Both completely opposites, meet each other in this series.

She's a spy, trained by her very own father, Tiago, to exact revenge against his enemy, Marcial, a general of the army. She will be wedged between the two forces because of her love for her family. Believing that what she's doing is for the good of all, what will she do when she discovers that everything she's fighting for is a lie? That Tiago, the father she has known and loved all her life is the real enemy using her against her real father, Marcial?

programme.title: Full Moon E31
programme.desc: Ferit Aslan is a very successful businessman, and is extremely organized. He wants the same manner of organization in both his private and professional life. Nazli who is studying gastronomy needs to find a job immediately as she is responsible for covering the expenses of the home she shares with her friend and sister. She is a stubborn and adamant personality, so she has a tough time keeping a job. Both completely opposites, meet each other in this series.

programme.title: Full Moon E32
programme.desc: Ferit Aslan is a very successful businessman, and is extremely organized. He wants the same manner of organization in both his private and professional life. Nazli who is studying gastronomy needs to find a job immediately as she is responsible for covering the expenses of the home she shares with her friend and sister. She is a stubborn and adamant personality, so she has a tough time keeping a job. Both completely opposites, meet each other in this series.

programme.title: Brothers E478
programme.desc: Ador is a model police officer dedicated to the ideals of service, honor and justice. He is respected by his community and well-loved by his family and peers. But Ador suddenly disappears in a police operation against human trafficking. His wife, young son and his grandmother are worried, but his superior tells them that he is seriously wounded and recovering in a safe house. A week after, Ador returns to his family and duty. Everyone around him feels that he behaves differently. There are events in the past he cannot remember and he does things he is not accustomed to do. Ador's loved ones try to understand that this is caused by trauma from the past encounter. But what they don't know is that Ador is already dead. And the person living with them is his long-lost twin brother, Cardo. Cardo is asked to take his brother's place to find out who is behind the human trafficking syndicate and weed out some police officers protecting it. While Cardo makes it his personal mission to avenge his brother's death, he has to deal with old wounds that separated him from Ador. He also finds himself slowly falling in love with his brother's wife and finding fulfillment in being a father to his brother's son. What awaits Cardo when he has to face the truth in the end?

programme.title: Viral Scandal E32
programme.desc: Kakay is an OFW who has been working abroad while her husband Dan works as a furniture maker. By working abroad, she hopes to provide a better future for her family. She thinks her sacrifices have been paying off now that her eldest Rica is on the verge of finishing her apprenticeship in an architectural firm and is about to take the board. Their real-life nightmare begins when Rica gets involved in a video that goes viral. As soon as Kakay learns about the scandal, she comes home to face the judgment and censure of the people around them. Aside from her family, she will also get support from her trusted friend and protector, Kyle, played by Joshua. How will Rica be able to prove her innocence in the said video? How will Kakay protect and defend her child from the accusations? What is the role of Troy Ramones', the mayor of Sidero, in the life of Rica and Kakay?

programme.title: Argentina, Land of Passion and Revenge E157
programme.desc: Torcuato and Bruno, two Spanish friends, flee from the Civil War to take refuge in Argentine territory. However, luck is not presented to them in the same way and they will soon succumb to mutual betrayals.

That Tiago, the father she has known and loved all her life is the real enemy using her against her real father, Marcial?

programme.title: LA VEUVE BLANCHE E168
programme.desc: Dulaari verse un seau d'eau sur Dhaani pour nettoyer la couleur. Dhaani pleure sans arrêt. Viplav et ses amis traînent dehors et s'assoient près du feu de joie. Il dit qu'il doit faire la dernière chose avant d'aller en Amérique et sourit. Ses amis essaient de l'arrêter pendant qu'il s'en va. Il ajoute secrètement du vin dans le pot de Dhaani et se cache. Il pense que ce sera amusant maintenant...

programme.title: LA VEUVE BLANCHE E169
programme.desc: Dulaari verse un seau d'eau sur Dhaani pour nettoyer la couleur. Dhaani pleure sans arrêt. Viplav et ses amis traînent dehors et s'assoient près du feu de joie. Il dit qu'il doit faire la dernière chose avant d'aller en Amérique et sourit. Ses amis essaient de l'arrêter pendant qu'il s'en va. Il ajoute secrètement du vin dans le pot de Dhaani et se cache. Il pense que ce sera amusant maintenant...

programme.title: LA RIVIÈRE DU DESTIN E19
programme.desc: En 1845, la maison d'Antônia est mise à sac par une tribu d'amérindiens. La jeune femme est sauvée par Apoena, l'un d'entre eux, dont elle tombe rapidement amoureuse. Cette idylle n'est pas du goût de Laru, la femme d'Apoena, qui, à l'aide d'un puissant shaman, jette un sort sur Antônia ainsi que sur toute sa descendance si ces derniers s'aventurent près des rives de l'Araguaya. Des années plus tard, la famille de Solano, l'arrière-petit-fils d'Antônia commence à être victime de la malédiction.

programme.title: FLEUR SAUVAGE S1 E14
programme.desc: L'histoire suit Lily Cruz, une belle héritière qui veut que justice soit rendue pour la mort de son père Dante et pour l'assaut de la mère Camia et la folie qui en résulte, en cherchant à se venger de la famille perverse des Ardiente, puissante dynastie politique de la province fictive qui porte leur nom. La famille Ardiente est la plus puissante dynastie politique de la province sous la juridiction du gouverneur Julio Ardiente et de sa fille Emilia, maire de la municipalité (Poblacion Ardiente). Raul, avec le droit des puissants, agresse Camia et incite Dante à porter plainte pour viol. Le monde de Lily s'effondre lorsque Dante meurt de manière suspecte d'une crise cardiaque et qu'elle est témoin du viol de sa mère. Bien que ciblés pour être tués, les assassins ressentent de la compassion pour la fillette de 9 ans et la libèrent à la place.

programme.title: L'HÉRITRIÈRE E70
programme.desc: Romina Andrada (Beauty Gonzalez), une secrétaire devenue épouse du magnat des affaires Robert Mondragon (Albert Martinez), qui l'a épousée bien qu'elle ait été violée et portait l'enfant de l'agresseur. À l'insu de Romina, c'est Daniela (Dimples Romana), la fille de Robert, qui avait orchestré son enlèvement juste avant de séduire le fiancé de Romina, Carlos Bartolomé (Adrian Alandy)

programme.title: L'HÉRITRIÈRE E71
programme.desc: Romina Andrada (Beauty Gonzalez), une secrétaire devenue épouse du magnat des affaires Robert Mondragon (Albert Martinez), qui l'a épousée bien qu'elle ait été violée et portait l'enfant de l'agresseur. programme.title: LA VEUVE BLANCHE E168
programme.desc: Dulaari verse un seau d'eau sur Dhaani pour nettoyer la couleur. Dhaani pleure sans arrêt. Viplav et ses amis traînent dehors et s'assoient près du feu de joie. Il dit qu'il doit faire la dernière chose avant d'aller en Amérique et sourit. Ses amis essaient de l'arrêter pendant qu'il s'en va. Il ajoute secrètement du vin dans le pot de Dhaani et se cache. programme.title: LA RIVIÈRE DU DESTIN E19
programme.desc: En 1845, la maison d'Antônia est mise à sac par une tribu d'amérindiens. La jeune femme est sauvée par Apoena, l'un d'entre eux, dont elle tombe rapidement amoureuse. Cette idylle n'est pas du goût de Laru, la femme d'Apoena, qui, à l'aide d'un puissant shaman, jette un sort sur Antônia ainsi que sur toute sa descendance si ces derniers s'aventurent près des rives de l'Araguaya. Des années plus tard, la famille de Solano, l'arrière-petit-fils d'Antônia commence à être victime de la malédiction.

programme.title: FLEUR SAUVAGE S1 E14
programme.desc: L'histoire suit Lily Cruz, une belle héritière qui veut que justice soit rendue pour la mort de son père Dante et pour l'assaut de la mère Camia et la folie qui en résulte, en cherchant à se venger de la famille perverse des Ardiente, puissante dynastie politique de la province fictive qui porte leur nom. La famille Ardiente est la plus puissante dynastie politique de la province sous la juridiction du gouverneur Julio Ardiente et de sa fille Emilia, maire de la municipalité (Poblacion Ardiente). Raul, avec le droit des puissants, agresse Camia et incite Dante à porter plainte pour viol. Le monde de Lily s'effondre lorsque Dante meurt de manière suspecte d'une crise cardiaque et qu'elle est témoin du viol de sa mère. Bien que ciblés pour être tués, les assassins ressentent de la compassion pour la fillette de 9 ans et la libèrent à la place.

programme.title: PASSION ET POUVOIR E01
programme.desc: Ennemis jurés depuis toujours, Eladio Gómez Luna et Arturo Montenegro Rivas ont passé leur vie à s'affronter en affaires et à se disputer les attentions de la même femme, Julia Vallado, qui décide de faire sa vie avec Arturo, l'homme qu'elle aime. Mais peu avant leur mariage, à l'issue d'une soirée bien arrosée, Arturo a une aventure sans lendemain avec une inconnue qui se retrouve enceinte. Par amertume, Julia épouse Eladio, dont elle n'est pas amoureuse.

programme.title: S-BELLE
programme.desc: S-BELLE est une émission de Beauté et Style qui cible uniquement les jeunes filles qui s'intéresse à la mode. L'émission offre aussi des petits secrets de Beauté et Style de vos célébrités préférées.

programme.title: VOICIVOILA
programme.desc: c'est une émission qui vous dite tout sur les stars et les célébrités de novelas.

programme.title: LA DONA S2 SS2 E57
programme.desc: Tout devient encore plus dangereux lorsque Mónica disparaît également et que l'agent León Contreras relie ce fait au groupe Los Arcoiris. Altagracia, cependant, résiste à le croire et soupçonne ses ennemis.

programme.title: LE PRIX DE LA PASSION E43
programme.desc: Ferhat est un tueur à gages travaillant pour son oncle Namik. Asli est une magnifique et idéaliste jeune femme médecin travaillant dans l'hôpital de Namik. Dans un monde de corruption, ces deux personnes diamétralement opposées vont se rapprocher.

programme.title: LUNE DE SANG E74
programme.desc: Il est préfiguré que l'enfant du vampire le plus puissant et du loup-garou choisi mettra fin au règne du vampire à l'encre maudite. L'histoire reprend après la bataille victorieuse des vampires vertueux et des loups-garous contre Lucas et ses alliés.

programme.title: KASAM E253
programme.desc: Tere Pyar Ki est l'histoire de deux amants, Rishi et Tanu, dont l'histoire d'amour est gâchée par le destin. Les cartes astrologiques de Tanu disent qu'elle est née en tant que protectrice de Rishi et qu'elle meurt dans une vie afin de les sauver.

programme.title: KASAM E254
programme.desc: Tere Pyar Ki est l'histoire de deux amants, Rishi et Tanu, dont l'histoire d'amour est gâchée par le destin. Les cartes astrologiques de Tanu disent qu'elle est née en tant que protectrice de Rishi et qu'elle meurt dans une vie afin de les sauver.

programme.desc: Tere Pyar Ki est l'histoire de deux amants, Rishi et Tanu, dont l'histoire d'amour est gâchée par le destin. Les cartes astrologiques de Tanu disent qu'elle est née en tant que protectrice de Rishi et qu'elle meurt dans une vie afin de les sauver.

programme.desc: Tere Pyar Ki est l'histoire de deux amants, Rishi et Tanu, dont l'histoire d'amour est gâchée par le destin. Les cartes astrologiques de Tanu disent qu'elle est née en tant que protectrice de Rishi et qu'elle meurt dans une vie afin de les sauver.

programme.title: LA DONA S2 SS2 E57
programme.desc: Tout devient encore plus dangereux lorsque Mónica disparaît également et que l'agent León Contreras relie ce fait au groupe Los Arcoiris. Altagracia, cependant, résiste à le croire et soupçonne ses ennemis.

programme.title: LUNE DE SANG E76
programme.desc: Il est préfiguré que l'enfant du vampire le plus puissant et du loup-garou choisi mettra fin au règne du vampire à l'encre maudite. L'histoire reprend après la bataille victorieuse des vampires vertueux et des loups-garous contre Lucas et ses alliés.

programme.title: A Esposa E27
programme.desc: Mónica conhece e apaixona-se por Adrian, o homem com quem se casa, que a ensina a amar de novo e que também lhe vai partir o coração.

programme.title: Irmãos E260
programme.desc: A série tem elementos de suspense e amor. A história gira em torno de um caso bizarro. Um bom policial morre misteriosamente, e seu Irmãos mais novo há muito perdido se tornará ele. O principal suspense da peça é se o protagonista consegue descobrir o verdadeiro assassino que matou seu Irmãos mais novo, e o emaranhado emocional entre ele e sua cunhada também é apresentado na peça.

programme.title: O Mundo dos Casados E26
programme.desc: Ji Sun-woo é uma médica de medicina familiar reverenciada e diretora associada do Family Love Hospital. Ela é casada com Lee Tae-oh, com quem ela tem um filho adolescente, Lee Joon-young. Sun-woo parece ter tudo, desde uma carreira de sucesso a uma família feliz, mas sem o conhecimento dela, ela é traída pelo marido e pelos amigos. Enquanto isso, Tae-oh sonha em se tornar um diretor de cinema famoso. Ele administra uma pequena empresa de entretenimento e cinema com o apoio de sua esposa. Mesmo que ele ame e cuide de sua esposa, Tae-oh se coloca em uma posição perigosa com um caso extraconjugal.

programme.title: Flor Silvestre E115
programme.desc: Num campo de rosas, Lily é uma flor silvestre. Num cruel golpe do destino, os seus pais morrem nas mãos implacáveis dos Ardientes, um poderoso clã político. Órfã em tenra idade, Lily não tem escolha a não ser se defender sozinha. Enquanto os Ardeintes pensam que ela está morta há muito tempo, ela sobrevive e é levada sob a asa de uma mulher destemida chamada Prianka, que a molda para ser ela mesma. Lily assume uma nova identidade, assumindo o nome da filha da Prianka, Ivy. Com fome de justiça, Lily retorna a sua cidade natal.

programme.title: Flor Silvestre E116
programme.desc: Num campo de rosas, Lily é uma flor silvestre. Num cruel golpe do destino, os seus pais morrem nas mãos implacáveis dos Ardientes, um poderoso clã político. programme.title: Coração de Soldado E25
programme.desc: Em 1997, uma operação militar separa os irmãos Saal e Hakeem Alhuraji. Desconhecido do seu passado, Hakeem é acolhido e renomeado Alex por um soldado militar chamado Dante. De volta a casa, Saal conspira vingança e acaba por esbater as linhas entre o inimigo e os parentes. Quais são os destinos de Saal e de Alex?

programme.title: Bolivar
programme.desc: Depicts the life and loves of Venezuelan Gen. Simón Bolívar, who helped liberate several Latin American countries from Spain.

programme.title: Waaris
programme.desc: With his husbands death in order to keep the title of "Shah" with in family Amba raises her daughter Manpreet (Mannu) as a boy making him the heir (Waaris) of the family as well as Shah of the Pawania Clan

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Ador is a model police officer dedicated to the ideals of service, honor and justice. He is respected by his community and well-loved by his family and peers. But Ador suddenly disappears in a police operation against human trafficking. His wife, young son and his grandmother are worried, but his superior tells them that he is seriously wounded and recovering in a safe house. A week after, Ador returns to his family and duty. Everyone around him feels that he behaves differently.

programme.title: Los Bastardos
programme.desc: Don Roman Cardinal's past reveals several sons. Separated from his true love, Soledad, believed to be dead, Roman is coupled with the duplicitous Alba. When the truth comes to light, Roman is determined to reunite his family.

programme.title: The Heiress
programme.desc: The story of Romina, a secretary turned wife of business tycoon, Robert, who married her despite the fact that she was raped and is carrying the child of the assailant. Unknown to Romina, it was Daniela, Robert's daughter, who had orchestrated her abduction, right before seducing Romina's fiance, Carlos

programme.title: Gathbandhan
programme.desc: A tongue-in-cheek story between a boy, who is a don, and a self-righteous girl studying to be a police officer

programme.title: Ashes of Love
programme.desc: Flower Goddess dies giving birth to her daughter, Jin Mi. She was imprisoned within Shui Jing until Xu Feng, heavenly emperor's second sun enters it mistakenly. After living together for 100years he falls in love with that ignorant Jin Mi.

programme.title: The Glory of Tang
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty under the rule of Emperor Zhu Qi Zhen, Tan Yun Xian comes from a long line of medicine practitioners, her family having served as court physicians for several generations. However, the practice for female physicians came to a halt when many were framed for abusing the form. Yet, Yun Xian is determined to learn medicine and so she does in secrecy, except things become difficult when her paths cross with the Emperor himself.

programme.title: Madhubala
programme.desc: Singing and worshiping always brings families and loved ones closer, the show will showcase the rich singing talent with live perfomances,interviews and music video in the Free state and whole the country hosted by Nonkululeko Kingi

programme.title: Bridges of Love
programme.desc: The story follows the lives of two brothers, Gael and Carlos, bound by their promise to support each other, but separated by an unfortunate accident

programme.title: Bolivar
programme.desc: Depicts the life and loves of Venezuelan Gen. Simón Bolívar, who helped liberate several Latin American countries from Spain.

programme.title: The Heiress
programme.desc: The story of Romina, a secretary turned wife of business tycoon, Robert, who married her despite the fact that she was raped and is carrying the child of the assailant. Unknown to Romina, it was Daniela, Robert's daughter, who had orchestrated her abduction, right before seducing Romina's fiance, Carlos

programme.title: Gathbandhan
programme.desc: A tongue-in-cheek story between a boy, who is a don, and a self-righteous girl studying to be a police officer

programme.title: Hollywood On Set
programme.desc: Hollywood On Set highlights the up's and downs of Americas most well known celebrities who are in the lime light.

programme.title: Waaris(Omnibus)
programme.desc: With his husbands death in order to keep the title of "Shah" with in family Amba raises her daughter Manpreet (Mannu) as a boy making him the heir (Waaris) of the family as well as Shah of the Pawania Clan

programme.title: The Glory of Tang
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty under the rule of Emperor Zhu Qi Zhen, Tan Yun Xian comes from a long line of medicine practitioners, her family having served as court physicians for several generations. However, the practice for female physicians came to a halt when many were framed for abusing the form. Yet, Yun Xian is determined to learn medicine and so she does in secrecy, except things become difficult when her paths cross with the Emperor himself.

programme.title: Madhubala
programme.desc: A young girl, who was born on a film set, has grown up surrounded by the movie world. But she is a simple girl who works as a beautician.

programme.title: Bridges of Love
programme.desc: The story follows the lives of two brothers, Gael and Carlos, bound by their promise to support each other, but separated by an unfortunate accident

programme.title: Bolivar
programme.desc: Depicts the life and loves of Venezuelan Gen. Simón Bolívar, who helped liberate several Latin American countries from Spain.

programme.title: Since I Found You
programme.desc: Since I Found You tells the story of five people looking for different kinds of love-- the boss (Piolo Pascual) meets the practicumer (Arci Muñoz) but the assistant (JC De Vera) likes the practicumer, the driver (Empoy) crushing on the secretary (Alessandra de Rossi) but the secretary loves the boss

programme.title: Amanda
programme.desc: Amanda returns to the Santa Cruz's Hacienda seeking revenge against the four men that raped her when she was just fourteen years old.

programme.title: The Glory of Tang
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty under the rule of Emperor Zhu Qi Zhen, Tan Yun Xian comes from a long line of medicine practitioners, her family having served as court physicians for several generations. Yet, Yun Xian is determined to learn medicine and so she does in secrecy, except things become difficult when her paths cross with the Emperor himself.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Ador is a model police officer dedicated to the ideals of service, honor and justice. He is respected by his community and well-loved by his family and peers. But Ador suddenly disappears in a police operation against human trafficking. His wife, young son and his grandmother are worried, but his superior tells them that he is seriously wounded and recovering in a safe house. A week after, Ador returns to his family and duty. Everyone around him feels that he behaves differently.

programme.title: The Promise of Chang'an E16
programme.desc: Helan Mingyu, the granddaughter of the lord of Yonglin, has been smart since childhood, and the boy met Xiao Chengxu, the ninth prince of Shengzhou, by accident. The news of Xiao Chengxu's "death in battle" was misrepresented. In order to save Chengxu's younger brother Xiao Chengxuan, Mingyu was forced to marry Chengxu's third brother, Xiao Chengrui, the king of Shengzhou, and was trapped in the harem. Xiao Chengxu repeatedly made military exploits to help Xiao Chengrui become emperor and establish the Dasheng Kingdom. Before he succeeded, Xiao Chengrui relapsed and died suddenly, and ordered Mingyu's son Xiao Qiyuan to succeed him in order to contain Xiao Chengxu and stabilize the court. Xiao Chengxu was forced to support Xiao Qiyuan, but he still wanted to marry Helan Mingyu. At the same time, Qi Yuan gradually grew up, dissatisfied with Xiao Chengxu's control, and even learned of his mother's affair with Xiao Chengxu under the provocation of others, and resented both of them. Helan Mingyu focused on the stability of Dasheng, and tried his best to find a balance between Qiyuan and Xiao Chengxu. Unexpectedly, Chengxu died in the battle, and Qiyuan was born with a love affair, and passed away with his favorite concubine Dong Ruoxuan. For the future of Dasheng, Mingyu once again accompanies the little emperor who is enthroned.

programme.title: Shaolin Wooden Men
programme.desc: A young boy witnesses the death of his father at the hands of a mysterious masked kung fu expert. As he grows older, he becomes a mute, and trains at Shaolin to become strong so he can one day avenge his father. Little does he know, one of his known teachers, a prisoner in the temple's strongholds, is actually his father's killer. 或者(Little Mute is an orphan traumatized into silence by the death of his father at the hands of a vicious fighting master. Living at the Shaolin monastery, he befriends a dangerous prisoner who teaches him a secret form of deadly kung fu. Seeing his intense determination, other masters share the wisdom of the Gliding Snake and Drunken Master techniques. In one of the most exciting fight scenes ever filmed, Little Mute must run the gauntlet of the famous 108 wooden men in an extreme test of skill and endurance. But if he becomes a master, will he use his unmatched force for redemption or revenge?)

programme.title: INU LAYE WA
programme.desc: What could make a family man remain steadfast with his wife despite his awareness of her infidelity acts?

programme.title: FLASE FLAG
programme.desc: HIV AIDS is not a death sentence nor is it the end of the world, A reputable Counselor reacts negatively to his son's decision to marry an HIV Patient, she did not at any moment practice what she teaches and her attitude leads to a dead-end

programme.title: IFEKUFE
programme.desc: A reunion party with old schoolmates caused a married woman unexpected event in her seemingly perfect marriage after several complaints from the husband about her spending much time on the phone chatting.

programme.title: NAAGIN RPT S1 E71
programme.desc: NAAGIN is about the snake-shape-shifting women who seek revenge for past sins committed. These serpent women fight evil and keep the ultimate source of power the NAAGMANI safe from evil.

programme.title: FEB 14TH
programme.desc: February 14th is a story of a special love day that didn't go as expected, a rivalry between two ladies over a man.

programme.title: KKK
programme.desc: An intriguing, captivating movie

programme.title: BETRAYAL
programme.desc: A young lady vowed not to go into any relationship again after being served breakfast severally in a row by men.

programme.title: CAMPUS LIFE S1 E37
programme.desc: Campus life is a high school-centered series focusing on students with different dreams and goals that they struggle to achieve despite trials and tribulations.

programme.title: EKA S1 E20
programme.desc: EKAA the word literally means Branch is a never-ending story of every human class, category, and strata it cuts across and speaks to everyone from the cheating wife to the faithful husband, the rich and the poor it all comes down to the humanity in us all.

programme.title: NAAGIN S1 E72
programme.desc: NAAGIN is about the snake-shape-shifting women who seek revenge for past sins committed. These serpent women fight evil and keep the ultimate source of power the NAAGMANI safe from evil.

programme.title: FOLA IGBORO
programme.desc: Two pretty daughters of a wealthy man gave up their influential lifestyles to live amongst a group of a dangerous gangsters. Things get complicated when an attack draws tragic but multiple discoveries of a hidden incident.

programme.title: WAARIS S1 E44
programme.desc: WAARIS tells the story of a mother who is forced to raise her 3rd girl-child as a boy in an effort to keep the peace in the village and prevent her violent brother-in-law from taking over leadership.

programme.title: Apaharan
programme.desc: Story of the tumultuous relationship between a father and son, set amidst the kidnapping industry in Bihar. Release Year: 2005 Director: Prakash Jha Awards: Best Dialogue: Prakash Jha, Best Performance in a Negative Role: Nana Patekar Awards of the International Indian Film Academy; Best Actor in a Villainous Role: Nana Patekar, Best Dialogue: Prakash Jha,Best Actor in a Villainous Role: Nana Patekar Filmfare Awards

programme.title: The Front Row With Anupama Chopra S02
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Dil Dosti Etc
programme.desc: Two college boys arrogance leads them to challenge each other to prove their efficiencies. It stars Shreyas Talpade, Imaad Shah, Nikita Anand, Smriti Mishra and Ishita Sharma. Release Year: 2007

programme.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
programme.desc: Raj, a rich, carefree, happy-go-lucky second generation NRI, follows Simran to India to win over her strict father and marry her. Release Year: 1995 Director: Aditya Chopra

programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: Aisha, who loves playing matchmaker much to her friend Arjun's disapproval, finds a new target in the simple Shefali. But in the process, she ends up ruining her own relationship with close friends. Release Year: 2010 Director: Rajshree Ojha

programme.title: Dil Jo Bhi Kahey
programme.desc: Karan and Sophie love each other but face parental opposition as they belong to different ethnicities and religions. Release Year: 2005 Director: Romesh Sharma

programme.title: War Chhod Na Yaar
programme.desc: Javed Jafferi and Sharman Joshi are having a fun time as army captains of Pakistan and India respectively until someone declares a war. Release Year: 2013 Director: Faraz Haider

programme.title: Singham Returns
programme.desc: DCP Singham begins a quest to track a black marketer with tremendous influence within the political system. Release Year: 2014 Director: Rohit Shetty Awards: Box Office India Day One Star Box Office India Awards

programme.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
programme.desc: Prem, who looks like Prince Vijay, replaces him just before his coronation. Although Vijay is engaged to Princess Maithili Sonam Kapoor, she falls in love with Prem. Release Year: 2015 Director: Sooraj R. Barjatya

programme.title: Darbar
programme.desc: DescriptionA police officer on a chase to hunt down a dreaded gangster for fulfilling his own secret agenda

programme.title: Akira
programme.desc: An action thriller in which a self-reliant college student takes on corrupt police officers single-handedly to prove her innocence. Release Year: 2016 Director: A.R. MurugadoSS

programme.title: Akira
programme.desc: An action thriller in which a self-reliant college student takes on corrupt police officers single-handedly to prove her innocence. Release Year: 2016 Director: A.R. MurugadoSS

programme.title: The Front Row With Anupama Chopra S01
programme.desc: Watch Anupama Chopra as she reviews the latest in Bollywood and Hollywood.

programme.title: Barefoot To Goa
programme.desc: 2015 drama revolves around two school kids, Diya Saara and her elder brother Prakhar Prakhar, who embark on a journey to Goa to bring back their grandmother who has been ignored by their parents. Release Year: 2015 Director: Praveen Morchhale

programme.title: Pyar To Hona Hi Tha
programme.desc: Sanjana loves Rahul, but Rahul treats Sanjana as a friend. He is attracted to Nisha, and announces that he will be marrying her soon.

programme.title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
programme.desc: Surinder, a simple man, falls for a vivacious Tani and gets married to her. In order to impress her, he undergoes a complete makeover and becomes Raj. Release Year: 2008 Director: Aditya Chopra Awards: Best Actor: Shah Rukh Khan Apsara Film Producers Guild Awards; Best Playback Singer - Male: Sukhwinder Singh, Best Scene of the Year Filmfare Awards

programme.title: Dil To Pagal Hai
programme.desc: Rahul, dancer-director of a dance troupe, is attracted to Pooja. His best friend Nisha is secretly in love with him. Release Year: 1997 Director: Yash Chopra Awards: Filmfare Awards- Best Film, Best Actor- Shah Rukh khan, best actreSSw- Madhuri Dixit, best ActreSS in a Supporting role- Karisma Kapoor, Best Music director- Uttam Singh, Best Dialogue, Best Art direction. Silver Lotus Awards- best supporting ActreSS- Karisma Kapoor.

programme.desc: After Colonel Abhay Singh and his protege Jai Bakshi have a fallout, Jai goes rogue and threatens to bring down the government. So the mentor is forced to go after him.

programme.title: Teri Meri Doriyaann S1 E40
programme.desc: It's hate at first sight for Saheba and Angad! But destined to be together, their lives get intertwined by a marriage alliance, and a love-hate story ensues.

programme.title: Imlie S1 E724
programme.desc: Imlie is forced to marry a journalist after they seek shelter in a hut during heavy rains. On reaching the city, she realises that her husband is already married.

programme.title: Yeh Hai Chahatein S1 E904
programme.desc: Preesha's life revolves around her son Saaransh, while Rudraksh is an insensitive Rockstar. When an unfortunate event brings these two at a crossroad, will it be a new beginning?

programme.title: Rajjo S1 E169
programme.desc: Rajjo, an athletically-gifted girl from a village, encounters Arjun, a rich but angry man, who saves her life during a calamity. However, they have to deal with the societal boundaries to be together.

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai S1 E3976
programme.desc: The story of a young married couple, Kartik and Naira trying to strike the perfect balance between their family values, personal beliefs and circumstances.

programme.title: Pandya Store S1 E666
programme.desc: In the era of nuclear families, Dhara uses her entrepreneurial foresight to revive her ancestral business. But ca she keep her family united against all odds?

programme.title: Faltu S1 E102
programme.desc: The story revolves around an unwanted girl, Faltu, named useless after her parents' frustration at the birth of a fourth girl when they wanted a boy.

programme.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin S1 E759
programme.desc: Virat sacrifices his love to honour the promise he made to a dying man. Trapped between the past and the present, will he find love beyond the chains of duty?

programme.title: Anupamaa S1 E830
programme.desc: Anupamaa, who parts with her ambitions and goals in a bid to raise her family, feels dejected when she fails to get any credit for her sacrifices and trials.

programme.title: TBN Spotlight
programme.desc: Join us for the best and latest in exclusive programming that entertains, inspires, and changes lives through God's message.

programme.title: Le pays de la violence
programme.desc: Réalisé par John Frankenheimer, "Le pays de la violence" est un superbe film désenchanté et automnal dans lequel le shérif d'une petite ville du Tennessee tombe amoureux de la fille d'un trafiquant d'alcool. Rythmé par la musique de Johnny Cash, on y retrouve le magnifique acteur Gregory Peck, dans le rôle du shérif. Le film montre une Amérique rurale peu connue.

programme.title: Ciel rouge
programme.desc: Juste après la Guerre de Sécession, un cow-boy vagabond, Jim Garry, loue ses services à Tate Rilling et Jack Pindalest, deux spéculateurs qui tentent, sous une apparente respectabilité, de déposséder un riche éleveur de ses troupeaux. Ecoeuré par leurs méthodes, Jim décide de quitter les deux escrocs et de rejoindre le camp de l'éleveur.

programme.title: La splendeur des Amberson
programme.desc: Eugene Morgan, l'ancien soupirant d'Isabel Amberson, réapparaît après une absence de deux décennies. L'homme, qui a fait fortune dans l'industrie naissante de l'automobile, est toujours attiré par la femme. Mais George, le fils de celle-ci, n'a pour lui que haine et mépris. La RKO prit la liberté d'amputer le métrage d'une cinquantaine de minutes et d'y ajouter un happy end. Dès son second film, Orson Welles commençait ainsi à collectionner les chefs-d'oeuvre massacrés...

programme.title: Une nuit au cinéma : Les Thrillers
programme.desc: Ce documentaire revient sur les débuts du genre, le développement des conventions stylistiques, la récurrence du personnage innocent accusé à tors, l'importance des rôles féminins : de la fille en détresse à la femmefatale. Le documentaire aborde aussi les différents types de méchants, l'impact de la seconde guerre mondiale sur le genre, l'émergence des thrillers violents dans les années 1960, celle du thriller paranoïaque dans les années 1970, et les raisons pour lesquelles ce genre reste aussi populaire à travers les époques. Pour ce documentaire, Laurent Bouzereau s'est notamment entretenu avec Bryan Singer, scénariste et réalisateur de "Usual Suspects", Norman Lloyd, acteur dans "La Cinquième colonne" d'Alfred Hitchcock, Martin Landau qui a joué dans "La Mort aux trousses", ou bien encore Paul Hirsch, monteur pour le film de Brian de Palma, "Blow out".

programme.title: Citizen Kane
programme.desc: Le milliardaire Charles Foster Kane, magnat de la presse, vient de mourir dans sa fabuleuse propriété de Xanadu en prononçant un seul mot : Rosebud. A partir de cette maigre piste, le reporter Thompson va tenter de reconstituer la vie de cet étrange personnage. L'un des meilleurs films de tous les temps.

programme.title: Un seul amour
programme.desc: La vie de l'actrice de théâtre Jeanne Eagles (1894-1929), vue à travers la passion d'un petit propriétaire de baraque foraine.

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: Un homme tombe amoureux, au cours d'un pique-nique, de la fiancée de son meilleur ami.

programme.title: L'inquiétante dame en noir
programme.desc: Récemment arrivé à Londres, un jeune diplomate américain loue un appartement dont la propriétaire est une ravissante Américaine. Le lendemain, il apprend qu'elle est suspectée d'avoir tué son mari.

programme.title: Phffft !
programme.desc: Après huit ans de mariage, Nina et Robert divorcent. Mais c'est en s'éloignant l'un de l'autre en rencontrant d'autres personnes que les deux se rendent compte qu'ils ne peuvent vivre sans l'autre.

programme.title: L'Adorable voisine
programme.desc: Désireuse de se venger d'une ex-camarade de classe devenue hautaine, Gillian, authentique sorcière à New York, jette un sort à Shepard, le fiancé de cette dernière. Mais ce qu'elle n'avait pas prévu, c'est qu'elle-même n'allait pas tarder à avoir des sentiments pour Shepard. Et lorsqu'une sorcière tombe amoureuse du commun des mortels, elle perd ses pouvoirs...

programme.title: Garçonnière pour quatre
programme.desc: Une étudiante effectue des recherches pour sa thèse sur les hommes américains et se fait passer pour une prostituée.

programme.title: Embrasse-moi, idiot !
programme.desc: Le professeur de piano jaloux Orville Spooner tente de vendre une chanson au célèbre chanteur de boîte de nuit Dino, qui est coincé en ville.

programme.title: Le pont de Remagen
programme.desc: En 1945, le pont Ludendorff à Remagen demeure le dernier ouvrage d'art intact sur le Rhin. Les Américains projettent de s'en emparer, car il n'ya d'autre voie pour pénétrer en territoire ennemi...

programme.title: Tobrouk, commando pour l'enfer
programme.desc: Septembre 1942. L'Afrika Korps de Rommel se rapproche dangereusement du canal de Suez. Pour contrer la percée des allemands, le Major Craig a un plan : détruire leurs réserves d'essence. Une unité d'élite composée de juifs allemands et de soldats britanniques s'envole pour la Lybie... Action et grand spectacle dans la lignée des grands films de guerre américains.

programme.title: Le Gaucher
programme.desc: Un jeune homme, Billy The Kid, venge le meurtre de son père adoptif et s'enfuie à Madero où il trouve refuge chez un armurier et sa femme.

programme.title: Le Gaucher
programme.desc: Un jeune homme, Billy The Kid, venge le meurtre de son père adoptif et s'enfuie à Madero où il trouve refuge chez un armurier et sa femme.

programme.title: Rachel et l'étranger
programme.desc: Ohio XIXe siècle. Après la mort subite de sa femme le fermier David Harvey assure seul l'éducation de son fils. Il décide de se remarier avec sa nouvelle servante Rachel qu'il traite comme une femme d'intérieur. Toutefois l'arrivée d'un trappeur et son béguin pour Rachel va éveiller en David des sentiments insoupçonnés.

programme.title: Joies Matrimoniales
programme.desc: David et Ann Smith, deux bourgeois de New York sont mariés depuis trois ans. Un jour ils apprenent que leur mariage a été mal enregistré et n'est pas légal. Cette nouvelle va boulerver leur existence…

programme.title: En Suivant la flotte
programme.desc: Bake Baker est amoureux de Sherry Martin, sa partenaire dans un numéro de danse. Mais quand il lui demande de l'épouser, elle refuse. Par dépit, il s'engage dans la marine…

programme.title: Terreur dans la vallée
programme.desc: Après trois ans d'absence, un bandit rentre chez lui armé et doit faire face à la menace que fait peser sur sa ville un gros éleveur de bétail corrompu.

programme.title: La Blonde ou la rousse
programme.desc: Le cœur d'un chanteur de cabaret balance entre sa partenaire une jolie blonde réservée et une rousse d'âge mûr au caractère incendiaire. Spécialiste de la comédie musicale George Sidney orchestre avec brio le choc de charme entre deux reines du sex-appeal plus envoûtantes l'une que l'autre.

programme.title: Une nuit au cinéma : Les films d'horreur
programme.desc: NA

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: La planète Krypton, menacée de destruction, Jor-El envoie son nourrisson sur la planète Terre dans un vaisseau spatial. Recueilli par les Kent, l'enfant dispose d'énormes pouvoirs. En apparence journalise au Daily Planet et amoureux de Lois Lane, il est aussi Superman, qui fait échouer les plans diaboliques de Lex Luthor pour éviter des catastrophes et sauver sa bien aimée.

programme.title: Superman 2
programme.desc: Superman vole au secours de son amie, la journaliste Lois Lane, aux prises avec un groupe de terroristes qui menace, du haut de la Tour Eiffel, d'anéantir Paris. Superman arrive à temps et fait exploser la bombe dans l'espace. Mais cette explosion va amener un nouveau danger, encore plus redoutable, sur la Terre.

programme.title: Superman 3
programme.desc: Auguste Gorman, sans argent et sans talent, se découvre un don pour l'informatique. Ross Webster, patron d'une puissante société et génie du mal à ses heures perdues, entend utiliser son génie pour dominer le monde grâce aux ordinateurs, et détruire Superman. Ce dernier se retrouve bientôt exposé à une kryptonite artificielle qui transforme sa personnalité et en fait un être maléfique.

programme.title: Superman 4 : le face à face
programme.desc: Afin de rendre le monde plus sûr pour les trafiquants d'armes nucléaires, l'horrible Lex Luthor crée un être humain pour concurrencer l'Homme de Fer : l'Homme Nucléaire, mutant soumis aux radiations…

programme.title: Air America
programme.desc: 1969 - Pour sortir du bourbier vietnamien, l'Amérique a établi au Laos une base aérienne secrète : Long Tieng, devenue en l'espace de quelques semaines la deuxième ville du pays. Des dizaines d'avions arborant le sigle d'"Air America" en décollent quotidiennement, portant nourriture et armes aux soldats anti-communistes. Ce pont aérien est assuré par certains des meilleurs pilots américains, aventuriers hauts en couleur, barjots et têtes brûlées, unis par le goût de l'action et du danger...

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Dark Hollywood. Dans le Hollywood des années 50, trois flics aux méthodes et aux mentalités contrastées enquêtent sur un meurtre sensible. Hommage au film noir, ce brillant polar en restitue parfaitement les codes, tant par son atmosphère que par son scénario couronné par un Oscar, sans oublier une distribution fabuleuse qui tient parfaitement ses promesses, notamment Kim Basinger, également oscarisée pour son rôle de prostituée sosie de l'actrice Veronica Lake.

programme.title: Le temps du châtiment
programme.desc: Dans un quartier populaire d'une grande ville américaine, la guerre des gangs vient de faire une nouvelle victime : un jeune aveugle porto-ricain a été assassiné par trois adolescents d'origine italienne. L'opinion publique exige un châtiment exemplaire. Hank Bell, adjoint du procureur, mène l'enquête.

programme.title: Garotas Bonitas
programme.desc: Quatro meninas de diferentes classes sociais querem entrar em um lugar chamado TAES Art Academy "Oficina de Artes Cênicas", são elas Mónica, Elena, Isabel e Leticia

programme.title: Apaixonando-Me Por Ramón
programme.desc: Fabiola e Andrea ficam órfãs quando seus pais morrem em um acidente de avião, e tanto elas quanto Hortensia, sua avó, ficam surpresas ao saber que a beneficiária de sua herança é ninguém menos que Juana.

programme.title: Antes Morta Que Lichita
programme.desc: Alicia Gutiérrez trabalha na Icónika, a agência de publicidade mais importante da América Latina, onde é vítima de bullying e exploração laboral por todos os seus colegas que a chamam ironicamente de "Lichita". Alicia permanece no mesmo cargo de suposta assistente desde que ingressou na Iconika (8 anos) mas só a chamam para servir café e fazer fotocópias por isso ela tem sido alvo de ridicularização por sua maneira de se vestir e sua ingenuidade em contar apenas com o apoio e amizade de Braulio e Brisa

programme.title: Coraçao Que Mente
programme.desc: Mariela Salvatierra lutará para recuperar o que lhe foi tirado de forma ruim e, ao mesmo tempo, terá que escolher entre a segurança que Leonardo lhe oferece e a paixão que sente por Alonso, a quem sempre considerou o amor de sua vida. .

programme.title: Ambiçào
programme.desc: Os cônjuges Catalina Creel (María Rubio) e Carlos Larios (Raúl Meraz) eram proprietários do gigantesco consórcio farmacêutico chamado Lar-Creel.

programme.title: Rosa Selvagem
programme.desc: Rosa García mora com sua madrinha Tomasa que a criou desde pequena, ambas são de classe muito humilde. Rosa é ingênua e não tem muita educação, quando alguém a irrita ela costuma repreender ou bater, as pessoas a chamam de "a selvagem" e ela parece um homem, já que costuma jogar futebol, bola de gude e outros jogos característicos de homens com outras crianças.

programme.desc: Alicia Gutiérrez trabalha na Icónika, a agência de publicidade mais importante da América Latina, onde é vítima de bullying e exploração laboral por todos os seus colegas que a chamam ironicamente de "Lichita". Alicia permanece no mesmo cargo de suposta assistente desde que ingressou na Iconika (8 anos) mas só a chamam para servir café e fazer fotocópias por isso ela tem sido alvo de ridicularização por sua maneira de se vestir e sua ingenuidade em contar apenas com o apoio e amizade de Braulio e Brisa

programme.title: Coraçao Que Mente
programme.desc: Mariela Salvatierra lutará para recuperar o que lhe foi tirado de forma ruim e, ao mesmo tempo, terá que escolher entre a segurança que Leonardo lhe oferece e a paixão que sente por Alonso, a quem sempre considerou o amor de sua vida. .

programme.title: Ambiçào
programme.desc: Os cônjuges Catalina Creel (María Rubio) e Carlos Larios (Raúl Meraz) eram proprietários do gigantesco consórcio farmacêutico chamado Lar-Creel.

programme.title: Garotas Bonitas
programme.desc: Quatro meninas de diferentes classes sociais querem entrar em um lugar chamado TAES Art Academy "Oficina de Artes Cênicas", são elas Mónica, Elena, Isabel e Leticia

programme.title: Rosa Selvagem
programme.desc: Rosa García mora com sua madrinha Tomasa que a criou desde pequena, ambas são de classe muito humilde. programme.title: POLICE STORY 3 SUPER COP
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

programme.title: MILLION DOLLAR BABY
programme.desc: After having worked with the best boxers of the world, Frankie Dunn and his best friend Scrap spend his days in the gym they own. One day a woman called Maggie arrives at the gym, ready to work hard and become a successful boxer, but she will need the support of Frankie, who doesn't want to train any woman.

programme.title: RUSH HOUR 2
programme.desc: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

programme.title: DEMOLITION MAN
programme.desc: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

programme.title: THE WAY OF THE DRAGON
programme.desc: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

programme.title: DRIVEN
programme.desc: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

programme.title: BAD BOYS (1995)
programme.desc: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

programme.title: U.S. MARSHALS
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

programme.title: GEOSTORM
programme.desc: A satellite designer tries to prevent disaster when the world's climate-control satellites fail to function.

programme.title: ANIMAL, THE (2001)
programme.desc: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.

programme.title: CLICK (2006)
programme.desc: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life.

programme.title: THE DEBT COLLECTOR 2
programme.desc: A pair of debt collectors are thrust into an explosively dangerous situation, chasing down various lowlifes while also evading a vengeful kingpin.

programme.title: ANACONDAS: TRAIL OF BLOOD
programme.desc: A genetically created Anaconda, cut in half, regenerates itself into two aggressive giant snakes, due to the Blood Orchid.

programme.title: HOSTAGE
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator, Jeff Talley, must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.

programme.title: HOSTAGE
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator, Jeff Talley, must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.

programme.title: TRAUMA CENTER
programme.desc: Alone and trapped in a locked-down hospital, an injured young woman must escape a pair of vicious killers who are after the only piece of evidence that can implicate them in a grisly murder, the bullet in her leg.

programme.title: PAYBACK
programme.desc: After a successful heist, Porter is shot by his wife and his best friend. They leave him there to die but when he recovers, he seeks revenge.

programme.title: TIME TO KILL, A
programme.desc: Two low-life rednecks brag about their brutal rape of a ten-year-old black girl, believing that they are above the law - then the little girl's father takes the law into his own hands.

programme.title: ANTHEM OF A TEENAGE PROPHET
programme.desc: "Anthem" tells the story of Luke, a teenager who foresees the death of his new best friend Stan. When this premonition comes true, Luke must deal with the trials and tribulations of being nicknamed "The Prophet of Death" and being dubbed a monster all over town.

programme.title: SURF NINJAS
programme.desc: Two boys learn from a mysterious warrior that they are the heirs to the throne of Patusan and set out to overthrow the current monarchy.

programme.title: LAST ACTION HERO
programme.desc: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

programme.title: THE DEBT COLLECTOR
programme.desc: A classically-trained martial artist goes to work as a mob debt collector. The job seems easy enough, until a client drags him into a situation deeper than could ever be anticipated.

programme.title: SHAWSHANK REDEMPTION, THE
programme.desc: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

programme.title: WHITE HOUSE DOWN
programme.desc: A Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

programme.title: RUSH HOUR
programme.desc: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

programme.title: BAD BOYS FOR LIFE
programme.desc: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

programme.title: DJANGO UNCHAINED
programme.desc: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

programme.title: WETLANDS, L'HÉRITAGE DE LUC HOFFMANN
programme.desc: Depuis le début du XXe siècle, près de deux tiers des zones humides ont disparu de la planète. Pour tenter d'enrayer ce phénomène, l'ornithologue suisse Luc Hoffmann (1923-2016), précurseur du développement durable, a conduit des actions protectrices dans le bassin méditerranéen et en Afrique de l'Ouest. Retour sur son combat. Réalisation : Stephan Rytz (Suisse, 2019) Palmarès : sélection Druk international film festival (Bhoutan 2019)

programme.title: UN SI GRAND SOLEIL
programme.desc: Épisode 273 Tandis que le torchon brûle entre Guilhem et Élisabeth, une nouvelle commerciale fait l'unanimité à L. Cosmétiques. Pendant ce temps, Alex et Manu soupçonnent une innocente... Réalisation : Christophe Reichert, Fouad Benhammou, Chris Nahon, David Durca (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Teilo Azaïs (Enzo), Moïse Santamaria (Manu Léoni), Maëlle Mietton (Alice Bastide), Stéphane Monpetit (Eliott Faure), Fred Bianconi (Virgile Berville), Valérie Kaprisky (Jo Real), Manuel Blanc (Guillem Cabestan), Benjamin Bourgois (Alexandre Lévy), Emma Colberti (Ève Prodi), Gary Guénaire (Théo Estrela), Folco Marchi (Ludovic Metay) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: CHRISTIAN BOLTANSKI, UN ARTISTE FACE À SON TEMPS
programme.desc: Depuis cinquante ans, Alain Fleischer et Christian Boltanski partagent à la fois une amitié indéfectible et un projet documentaire inclassable. La grande rétrospective que le Centre Pompidou, à Paris, a consacré à Christian Boltanski est l'occasion idéale pour Alain Fleischer de dévoiler sa pinacothèque personnelle, riche d'archives inestimables. Réalisation : Alain Fleischer (France, 2020)

programme.title: CHACUN SON ÎLE
programme.desc: Île de la Grande Barrière Séparée de la Nouvelle-Zélande par le golfe de Hauraki, l'île de la Grande Barrière offre un cadre paradisiaque qui permet de mener un quotidien simple, en harmonie avec la nature. Dans ce coin de Pacifique, on peut s'isoler du reste du monde tout en faisant partie d'une communauté soudée. Réalisation : Myriam Berthelet, Étienne Deslières, Michel D.T. Lam, Joanne Robertson, Pierre-Luc Robillard, Mathieu Vachon (Canada, saison 2, 2017) Avec Sophie Fouron.

programme.title: WARI
programme.desc: Magazine économique qui traite de l'actualité économique et du développement en Afrique. Chaque semaine, le magazine propose plusieurs dossiers présentés sous forme de reportages qui analysent des programmes en cours de développement. Les secteurs prioritaires comme l'éducation, la santé, l'environnement, le développement des infrastructures y sont évoqués.

programme.title: TV5MONDE, LE JOURNAL AFRIQUE
programme.desc: Toute l'actualité africaine proposée par la rédaction de TV5MONDE. Présentation : Namouri Dosso, Dominique Tchimbakala, Salah-Eddine Gakou (en alternance). http://information.tv5monde.com

programme.title: LE 6H00 INFO
programme.desc: Le journal de 6h00 (heure de Paris) proposé par la rédaction de France Télévisions. Présentation : Samuel Étienne.

programme.desc: Le journal télévisé proposé par la rédaction de Radio-Canada.

programme.desc: À la découverte des trésors des régions de France, des initiatives et des personnalités qui les font vivre. Présentation : Cyril Viguier.

Épisode 11 : Le scandale Soraya reçoit la visite surprise de sa mère. Yasmine profite de son idylle avec son amoureux de producteur. Gisèle utilise l'un de ses collaborateurs pour enquêter sur Soraya. La mère de Soraya se rend chez les parents de Marc pour faire un scandale. Réalisation : Marie Amon (Côte d'Ivoire, saison 1, 2017) D'après une idée originale d'Alexandra Amon. programme.title: LES SECRETS DE L'AMOUR
programme.desc: Déjà vu Morgane est kidnappée par des inconnus. Kimberley contacte Greg et Brian pour leur proposer son plan d'action. Alors qu'elle est en train de recruter une nouvelle secrétaire, Daniel annonce à Rebecca qu'il met un terme à leur relation. Réalisation : Benjamin Eyaga (Cameroun, saison 1, 2021) Distribution : Benjamin Eyaga (Billy Manga), Passy Ngah (Mélanie Balomog), Marie-Inès Ayonga (Kimberley Essono), Timoléon Boyoguenou (Daniel Manga), Rigobert Tamwa (James Kilembe), Kareyce Fotso (Kenza Diengdam), Sandrine Dzinguene (Rebecca Banengo), Aline Komtchou (Allison Kilembe), Patrick Oyono (Jason Simo), Henri Matip (Brian), Francis Tene K. (Greg) Genre : comédie dramatique Palmarès : sélection officielle (Vues d'Afrique 2021, Fespaco 2021, Écrans Noirs 2021, Cannes 2021)

programme.title: UN SI GRAND SOLEIL
programme.desc: Épisode 992 Damien n'assume pas ses actes vis à vis de Thaïs. Parallèlement, le vernissage de la galerie d'Alix bat son plein jusqu'à ce que le critique invité se révèle être une connaissance de Damien... Réalisation : Marion Lallier, Emmanuelle Caquille, Chiara Malta, Laura Saulnier (saison 4, France, 2022) Distribution : Chrystelle Labaude (Élizabeth), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Fred Bianconi (Virgile), Manuel Blanc (Guilhem) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: CUISINE OUVERTE
programme.desc: À Strasbourg, avec Jérôme Niel Mory Sacko s'attaque à un grand classique des fromages alsaciens : le munster, qu'il va utiliser pour cuisiner des cannelloni aux épinards. Il est secondé par le comédien et humoriste Jérôme Niel. Présentation : Mory Sacko.

programme.title: SLAM
programme.desc: Trois candidats s'affrontent sur des grilles de mots fléchés qu'ils tentent de remplir en trouvant les réponses aux définitions proposées. Mais pour avoir accès aux définitions, ils doivent d'abord répondre à des questions qui ont une caractéristique bien particulière : la réponse est toujours une lettre. Présentation : Cyril Féraud.

programme.title: TOUT LE MONDE VEUT PRENDRE SA PLACE
programme.desc: Le jeu où tout le monde peut devenir champion. Un quiz, des candidats, et un champion que tous rêvent de déloger ! Présentation : Laurence Boccolini.

programme.title: TEMPS PRÉSENT
programme.desc: Guerre des sexes au chalet (1) Qu'est-ce qu'une femme ? Qu'est-ce qu'un homme ? Avec l'émergence ces dernières années de ce qu'on appelle le néo-féminisme, même ces questions de base sont devenues polémiques. Quatre femmes et quatre hommes, de générations et de convictions différentes, confrontent leurs points de vue autour de sujets sensibles : les rapports homme-femme, le genre, la séduction, l'égalité, le consentement.... Rassemblés dans un chalet le temps d'un week-end, les huit protagonistes apprennent à se connaître. Les discussions sont vives, les émotions parfois intenses, mais loin du vulgaire affrontement, chacune et chacun se révèle dans son humanité et sa complexité. Reportage : Laurence Gemperlé, Jacob Berger. Présentation : Jean-Philippe Ceppi.

programme.title: 5 CHEFS DANS MA CUISINE
programme.desc: Gâteau de crêpes à la tartinade chocolat-amandes Bob le Chef confectionne un gâteau de crêpes, qu'il sert avec une tartinade chocolat-amandes. Présentation : Marina Orsini. Réalisation : Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: LE JOURNAL DE LA RTBF

programme.title: COUPÉ ! UNE HISTOIRE DÉCALÉE
programme.desc: 2002. Emmené par le charismatique Douk Saga, dit « président », le groupe Jet Set invente à Paris le coupé-décalé. Une nouvelle musique, une nouvelle danse qui se répandent comme une trainée de poudre jusqu'au pays, la Côte d'Ivoire, apaisant les tensions nées de la grave crise sociale et politique qu'il traverse. Réalisation : Toussaint Aka, Osita Aneke (Côte d'Ivoire, 2013) Genre : documentaire

programme.title: MARIA CASARÈS, ALBERT CAMUS - TOI, MA VIE
programme.desc: La comédienne Maria Casarès et l'écrivain Albert Camus ont vécu une passion intense que révèle leur correspondance. De 1944, année de leur rencontre, jusqu'à la mort de Camus, en 1960, ils échangent plus de neuf cents lettres. Ces courriers mettent en lumière la femme libre, éprise de vérité et d'absolu. Réalisation : Élisabeth Kapnist (France, 2022)

programme.title: QUESTIONS POUR UN CHAMPION
programme.desc: Jeu de culture générale. Présentation : Samuel Étienne.

programme.title: STARS PARADE
programme.desc: ''Stars parade'' est une émission musicale consacrée aux artistes africains. En privilégiant les rencontres et les genres, Stars parade permet à la musique africaine de s'exprimer et de se faire connaître à travers le monde grâce à sa diversité culturelle et à la richesse de ses mélodies. Présentation : Boncana Maïga

programme.title: TV5MONDE, LE JOURNAL AFRIQUE
programme.desc: Toute l'actualité africaine proposée par la rédaction de TV5MONDE. Présentation : Namouri Dosso, Dominique Tchimbakala, Salah-Eddine Gakou (en alternance). http://information.tv5monde.com

programme.title: #INVESTIGATION
programme.desc: Au sommaire : École cherche profs désespérément En Belgique, près de la moitié des écoles souffrent d'une pénurie d'enseignants. Manque de respect et d'encadrement, lourdeur du système et des charges administratives : les plus expérimentés ne tiennent plus, les plus jeunes abandonnent. Espèces invasives, la menace silencieuse C'est un danger pour la planète encore largement sous-estimé. Les espèces invasives sont une menace pour la biodiversité, mais aussi pour l'économie. En Belgique, les supers champions invasifs s'appellent frelon asiatique, moustique-tigre, berce de Caucase ou raton laveur. Présentation : Justine Katz.

programme.title: À LA VALDRAGUE
programme.desc: Épisode 5 : La tentation Denis, un technicien qui travaille au verger, vient au secours d'Edmour qui s'est blessé. Yolande trouve Denis à son goût, mais Rita pense qu'elle joue avec le feu en flirtant avec lui. Réalisation : Joël A. Robichaud (saison 3, Canada, 2020) Scénario : Patricia Léger, Marcel-Romain Thériault Distribution : Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre : comédie

programme.title: À LA VALDRAGUE
programme.desc: Épisode 6 : Exposition Les parents de Zoël sont de passage à Saint-Prospère et leurs commentaires sur le contenu de son exposition suscitent le doute chez lui. Quand Rita apprend que la mère de Zoël la trouve trop autoritaire avec son fils, elle se démène pour lui prouver le contraire. Réalisation : Joël A. Robichaud (saison 3, Canada, 2020) Scénario : Patricia Léger, Marcel-Romain Thériault Distribution : Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre : comédie

programme.title: À LA VALDRAGUE
